Title: Software Developer - IIoT, ML, AI in Pharmaceutical Sector - Terrassa, Barcelona, Espa√±a
Description:
We are looking for a software developer to expand our team in Barcelona, our internal purpose is creating a work environment that facilitates and promotes the professional growth of the individuals comprising the COMSER team and our external purpose is to aid and expedite the industrialization of new medications that enhance the quality of life for people.

Key Responsibilities

A software developer for pharmaceutical processes, specializing in IIoT (Industrial Internet of Things), Machine Learning (ML), and Artificial Intelligence (AI) to fulfil a dynamic and multifaceted role in the R&D department. Here's a detailed job description for such a position:


Develop and Implement IIoT Solutions: Design and develop software solutions for the Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) to enhance manufacturing and operational processes in the pharmaceutical industry. This includes sensor integration, data collection, and real-time monitoring systems.
Machine Learning and AI Implementation: Utilize machine learning algorithms and AI techniques to analyse large datasets for quality control and optimization of pharmaceutical processes. Develop models that improve decision-making and automate complex processes.
Data Management and Analysis: Handle vast amounts of data generated by IIoT devices. Implement data storage solutions, ensure data integrity, and perform data analysis to extract valuable insights.
Collaboration with Cross-Functional Teams: Work closely with other departments such as laboratory team, qualification & validations department, quality assurance, to understand their needs and develop customized software solutions.
Compliance and Security: Ensure all software solutions comply with industry regulations, including data privacy laws and good manufacturing practices (GMP & GAMP 5). Implement robust security measures to protect sensitive data.
Continuous Improvement: Continuously explore ways to enhance existing systems and propose innovative solutions.
Documentation and Reporting: Maintain comprehensive documentation of software systems and provide regular reports on project progress and performance.


What do we expect from you?


Computer Engineering Degree, Software Engineering, or related technical discipline.
Fluency in software fundamentals, including software design and maintainability.
Proven experience in software development, preferably in the pharmaceutical industry.
Knowledge of IIoT technologies, machine learning models, and AI algorithms.
Experience in programming languages such as Python, C# .NET, C++ or Java, as well as web programming.
Experience with database management and data analysis tools, also in cloud platforms.
Basic knowledge of control industrial systems (PLC, SCADA...), sensors and industrial communication protocols.
Familiarity with pharmaceutical industry standards and compliance requirements.
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work in a team environment.
Business fluency in English and Spanish, with additional language skills as a plus
Willingness and ability to travel at client site when needed (occasional).


What do we offer?


Continuous training and professional skills.
An exciting and positive atmosphere, where you are valued.
Recognition and reward for individual as well as team achievements
Flexible working hours and the possibility to work remotely.


This role requires a unique blend of technical expertise, industry knowledge, and a passion for innovation, making it both challenging and rewarding for software developers.

At Comser, we are committed to creating an inclusive and diverse work environment. We value and respect individual differences, fostering an atmosphere where each person can contribute with their unique skills and perspectives. We believe that diversity enriches our team and strengthens our ability to innovate.
Show more

This role requires a unique blend of technical expertise, industry knowledge, and a passion for innovation, making it both challenging and rewarding for software developers.

At Comser, we are committed to creating an inclusive and diverse work environment. We value and respect individual differences, fostering an atmosphere where each person can contribute with their unique skills and perspectives. We believe that diversity enriches our team and strengthens our ability to innovate.

Title: COMPUTER VISION / AI RESEARCHER
Description:
EURECAT

Eurecat is the main Research & Technology Organisation in Catalonia and the second largest private research organization in southern Europe. It brings together the experience of more than 700 professionals and provides services to more than 2,000 companies. Applied R&D, technological services, highly specialized training, technological consultancy or valorisation and exploitation of industrial property are some of the services that Eurecat offers for both large and small and medium-sized enterprises in all sectors. The technology centre participates in more than 200 large national and international consortium projects of high strategic R&I and has 181 patents and 10 spin-offs. The added value provided by Eurecat accelerates innovation, reduces spending on scientific and technological infrastructures, reduces risks and provides specialized knowledge tailored to each company.

Job Description

The Multimedia Technologies unit is formed by the Image and Audio research groups, as well as the Interactive Visualization development group.

The Image group has expertise in applied research and development of computer vision technologies, including video processing, multi-view and 3D content. In particular, we have extensive experience of more than 10 years in applied artificial intelligence systems such as object detection and semantic segmentation for autonomous driving, monoscopic 360 depth estimation in audiovisual post-production, cross-modal generative models including video, or satellite imaging enhancement. It has participated in several international projects (Autopost, 3Flex, M√∂bius), national (Framework, Look4You, AI4ES), regional (ViVIM, Mironins) as well as in several projects for private clients.

Eurecat wishes to incorporate into its Area of MULTIMEDIA TECHNOLOGY located in Barcelona a

COMPUTER VISION RESEARCHER ON AI FOR MULTIMEDIA APPLICATION

Functions And Responsabilities


Perform R&D tasks by implementing and solving variated Computer Vision problems for disparate applied sectors.
Participate in innovation projects for both private clients and consortiums with public funds.
Collaborate in drafting proposals and execute European R&D projects.
Report and present results derived from R&D tasks.


Requirements

KNOWLEDGE AND STUDIES:


Candidates should have a degree on computer science or related field, in particular machine learning and ideally computer vision.


Experience


Academic or professional experience in research or applied projects related with computer vision.
Experience with deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, TFlow,..).
Advanced skills in Python, clean writing clean, code maintenance.
Other programming languages such as C++ or frameworks such as OpenCV will be valuated positively.
Linux companion and Git should be in your daily toolbox.
Proved background in developing tools in the Media, Culture, and Arts sector is also valuable.


Languages


Mandatory English
Desirable: Spanish or Catalan

Title: Cloud Data Scientist (m/f/d)
Description:
Why Choose TD SYNNEX:

As a Fortune 500 global corporation, operating in over 100 countries, TD SYNNEX values its diverse workforce of 23,000 employees. As the biggest IT distributor in the world, our mission is to provide top-notch technology solutions, empowering businesses and individuals to navigate the digital world safely and efficiently.

TD SYNNEX continues building up its highly successful Data Practice and looking for a passionate and talented Data Scientists to join our European excellence team.

About the role:

In this role, you‚Äôll have the chance to roll up your sleeves and apply data science methods and analytics to real-world business situations across a variety of business scenarios in technology distribution industry. As the field of advanced analytics is rapidly evolving, the Data Scientist is responsible for staying current on leading-edge business applications, tools and approaches, proactively working with the Analytics Leadership to enhance offerings that deliver competitive advantage to TD SYNNEX.

Our Data team working environment and what you'll do:


Always working with the latest Cloud based Data Science technologies, such as Snowflake SQL, Python/R, Tableau, Power BI, AWS Services...
Large number and size of the data sources / Variable analytics use cases (truly BIG DATA)
100% of work on real use cases, with real business use (no POC‚Äôs without use)
Agile and experimental approach, new implementations within days not months
Active involvement in E2E business solution, incl. solution design and presentation of the results of your work. In our company, your opinion matters, and your personal development is equally important like the development of the company.
Collaboration with Cloud Vendor Business within TD SYNNEX departments and other BI Teams across the organization.


What we're kindly looking for:


Minimum of 2 - 4 years experience working as a Data Scientist or BI Intelligence
Fluency in English is required
Have deep Data Science expertise: The successful candidate will have a wealth of experience with applying advanced analytics to a variety of business situations, such that they can efficiently and effectively advise multiple teams on the best path to uncovering critical insights for clients.
Relevant SQL skills
Knowledge, Skills, and/or Abilities Required: Hands on programming/scripting experience in Python or R. Power BI and Power platforms experience is necessary.
An autonomous self-starter with a passion for analytics and problem solving. You will help build new Analytics service offerings that grow our portfolio of products and will captures proprietary content and support the creation of proposal/selling documents.
Strong presence, strong collaborator skills and ability to operate effectively in a matrix organization are a must.
Love building things and are comfortable working with modern development tools Have a proven ability to synthesize complex data; as well as a deep understanding of modern machine learning techniques and their mathematical underpinnings and are able to translate this into business implications for our clients.
Confident statistical and machine learning skills
Strong experience with practical data science and hands-on involvement with deployed ML pipelines in a business environment
Team player with great communication skills and willing to help the other team members. Potentially act as mentor to juniors.
Proactive and self-motivated


What We Offer:


Hybrid work - (2 days at the office, 3 days at home)
We value continuous learning and provide you with the necessary resources to upskill your professional competencies
We provide comprehensive benefits including health insurance, paid leave, retirement plans, and quite some more.


What‚Äôs In It For You?


Elective Benefits: Our programs are tailored to your country to best accommodate your lifestyle.
Grow Your Career: Accelerate your path to success (and keep up with the future) with formal programs on leadership and professional development, and many more on-demand courses.
Elevate Your Personal Well-Being: Boost your financial, physical, and mental well-being through seminars, events, and our global Life Empowerment Assistance Program.
Diversity, Equity & Inclusion: It‚Äôs not just a phrase to us; valuing every voice is how we succeed. Join us in celebrating our global diversity through inclusive education, meaningful peer-to-peer conversations, and equitable growth and development opportunities.
Make the Most of our Global Organization: Network with other new co-workers within your first 30 days through our onboarding program.
Connect with Your Community: Participate in internal, peer-led inclusive communities and activities, including business resource groups, local volunteering events, and more environmental and social initiatives.


Don‚Äôt meet every single requirement? Apply anyway.

At TD SYNNEX, we‚Äôre proud to be recognized as a great place to work and a leader in the promotion and practice of diversity, equity and inclusion. If you‚Äôre excited about working for our company and believe you‚Äôre a good fit for this role, we encourage you to apply. You may be exactly the person we‚Äôre looking for!


Show more

Title: Junior Research Engineer Biomolecular Simulations (MDDB/BioExcel) (RE1)
Description:
Job Reference

25_25_LS_INBCN2_RE1

Position

Junior Research Engineer Biomolecular Simulations (MDDB/BioExcel) (RE1)

Closing Date

Friday, 28 February, 2025

Reference: 25_25_LS_INBCN2_RE1

Job title: Junior Research Engineer Biomolecular Simulations (MDDB/BioExcel) (RE1)

About BSC

The Barcelona Supercomputing Center - Centro Nacional de Supercomputaci√≥n (BSC-CNS) is the leading supercomputing center in Spain. It houses MareNostrum, one of the most powerful supercomputers in Europe, was a founding and hosting member of the former European HPC infrastructure PRACE (Partnership for Advanced Computing in Europe), and is now hosting entity for EuroHPC JU, the Joint Undertaking that leads large-scale investments and HPC provision in Europe. The mission of BSC is to research, develop and manage information technologies in order to facilitate scientific progress. BSC combines HPC service provision and R&D into both computer and computational science (life, earth and engineering sciences) under one roof, and currently has over 1000 staff from 60 countries.

Look At The BSC Experience

BSC-CNS YouTube Channel

Let's stay connected with BSC Folks!

We are particularly interested for this role in the strengths and lived experiences of women and underrepresented groups to help us avoid perpetuating biases and oversights in science and IT research. In instances of equal merit, the incorporation of the under-represented sex will be favoured.

We promote Equity, Diversity and Inclusion, fostering an environment where each and every one of us is appreciated for who we are, regardless of our differences.

If you consider that you do not meet all the requirements, we encourage you to continue applying for the job offer. We value diversity of experiences and skills, and you could bring unique perspectives to our team.

Context And Mission

Our group at the Life Sciences Department is developing a research line centred on the development and maintenance of research infrastructures to serve large-scale projects in the Life Sciences domain. In this context, on one hand BioExcel Center of Excellence (https://bioexcel.eu) is a project seeking to establish a stable infrastructure for software management in the field of Biomolecular simulations; on the other hand the MDDB project (https://mddbr.eu) is developing the initial establishment of a large scale federated repository for biomolecular simulations. The candidate is expected to have a strong involvement in the development of the core technical infrastructure for MDDB and the provision of advanced tools for simulation study including both traditional and AI based strategies.

Key Duties


Contribute to the development of software components related to biomolecular simulations, docking and chemoinformatics
Manage the deployment of tools in a variety of computational infrastructures
Contribute to the development of software related to large scale database infrastructures
Participate in project meetings and reporting.


Requirements


Education
High degree in a informatics/bioinformatics related field
Or a Higher vocational education (FPII)
Essential Knowledge and Professional Experience
Knowledge of scripting languages (python preferred), software library development, and its integration in software repositories (PyPi, Conda, etc.)
Knowledge of data and database management (NoSQL)
Additional Knowledge and Professional Experience
Knowledge of software quality practices
Knowledge of biomolecular simulation (MD) and structural bioinformatics
Knowledge of AI technologies including machine and deep learning.
Fluency in both written and spoken English
Competences
The ability to understand scientific literature, and software documentation
Ability to communicate scientific results
Ability to work independently
Ability to represent the team in international project meetings

Conditions


The position will be located at BSC within the Life Sciences Department
We offer a full-time contract (37.5h/week), a good working environment, a highly stimulating environment with state-of-the-art infrastructure, flexible working hours, extensive training plan, restaurant tickets, private health insurance, support to the relocation procedures
Duration: Open-ended contract due to technical and scientific activities linked to the project and budget duration
Holidays: 23 paid vacation days plus 24th and 31st of December per our collective agreement
Salary: we offer a competitive salary commensurate with the qualifications and experience of the candidate and according to the cost of living in Barcelona
Starting date: asap


Applications procedure and process

All applications must be submitted via the BSC website and contain:


A full CV in English, including contact details.
A cover/motivation letter with a statement of interest in English, clearly specifying for which specific area and topics the applicant wishes to be considered. Additionally, two references for further contacts must be included. Applications without this document will not be considered.


Development of the recruitment process

The selection will be carried out through a competitive examination system ("Concurso-Oposici√≥n"). The recruitment process consists of two phases:


Curriculum Analysis: Evaluation of previous experience and/or scientific history, degree, training, and other professional information relevant to the position. - 40 points
Interview phase: The highest-rated candidates at the curriculum level will be invited to the interview phase, conducted by the corresponding department and Human Resources. In this phase, technical competencies, knowledge, skills, and professional experience related to the position, as well as the required personal competencies, will be evaluated. - 60 points. A minimum of 30 points out of 60 must be obtained to be eligible for the position.


The recruitment panel will be composed of at least three people, ensuring at least 25% representation of women.

In accordance with OTM-R principles, a gender-balanced recruitment panel is formed for each vacancy at the beginning of the process. After reviewing the content of the applications, the panel will begin the interviews, with at least one technical and one administrative interview. At a minimum, a personality questionnaire as well as a technical exercise will be conducted during the process.

The panel will make a final decision, and all individuals who participated in the interview phase will receive feedback with details on the acceptance or rejection of their profile.

At BSC, we seek continuous improvement in our recruitment processes. For any suggestions or comments/complaints about our recruitment processes, please contact recruitment@bsc.es.

For more information, please follow this link.

Deadline

The vacancy will remain open until a suitable candidate has been hired. Applications will be regularly reviewed and potential candidates will be contacted.

OTM-R principles for selection processes

BSC-CNS is committed to the principles of the Code of Conduct for the Recruitment of Researchers of the European Commission and the Open, Transparent and Merit-based Recruitment principles (OTM-R). This is applied for any potential candidate in all our processes, for example by creating gender-balanced recruitment panels and recognizing career breaks etc.

BSC-CNS is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusion. We are pleased to consider all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability or any other basis protected by applicable state or local law.

For more information follow this link

This position is reserved for candidates who meet the requirements and have the legal status of disabled persons with a degree of disability equal to or greater than 33%. In case there are no applicants with disabilities that meet the requirements, the rest of the candidates without declared disability will be evaluated.

Application Form

The panel will make a final decision, and all individuals who participated in the interview phase will receive feedback with details on the acceptance or rejection of their profile.

At BSC, we seek continuous improvement in our recruitment processes. For any suggestions or comments/complaints about our recruitment processes, please contact recruitment@bsc.es.

For more information, please follow this link.

Deadline

The vacancy will remain open until a suitable candidate has been hired. Applications will be regularly reviewed and potential candidates will be contacted.

OTM-R principles for selection processes

BSC-CNS is committed to the principles of the Code of Conduct for the Recruitment of Researchers of the European Commission and the Open, Transparent and Merit-based Recruitment principles (OTM-R). This is applied for any potential candidate in all our processes, for example by creating gender-balanced recruitment panels and recognizing career breaks etc.

BSC-CNS is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusion. We are pleased to consider all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability or any other basis protected by applicable state or local law.

For more information follow this link

This position is reserved for candidates who meet the requirements and have the legal status of disabled persons with a degree of disability equal to or greater than 33%. In case there are no applicants with disabilities that meet the requirements, the rest of the candidates without declared disability will be evaluated.

Title: Junior Data Scientist 1
Description:
Mission

If You Have a Passion For Data And Technology And Want To Join a Crew Of Sharp Analytical Minds, Then This May Be The Right Opportunity For You. As a Junior Data Scientist, You Will Get a Chance To Take Part On The Typical Tasks Our Data Scientists Do On a Daily Basis


Translate business needs to technical requirements
Define strategy for use of data and how data use interacts with data design
Create and document reusable packages and libraries in Python and other languages
Perform data studies and data discovery around new data sources or new uses for existing data sources
Develop, train, finetune and industrialize ML models
Implement and hands-off data checking and updating procedures to other teams
Be a member of an AI laboratory performing discovery tasks and developing AI products
Develop end-to-end data science applications, including complex distributed data processing, creating an analysis framework (e.g. models, algorithms, etc.), developing custom complex visualization tools, and deploying web applications


Your profile


Until 2 years of experience in data science
Experience with data programming/ scripting languages (Python, R, SQL)
Experience in machine-learning methodologies (supervised /unsupervised, deep learning)
Experience performing ETL functions and understanding data quality steps
Strong in quantitative analysis, statistics, or mathematics
Experience in communicating technically, at a level appropriate for the audience
Ability to work in a fast pace and learn quickly
(Bonus) Master in Data Science /Machine Learning
(Bonus) Experience with regression modeling, forecasting, and/ or time series analysis
(Bonus) Experience with NLP
(Bonus) Experience with visualization tools (Shiny, Power BI, Tableau)
(Bonus) AWS Cloud/Azure experience/exposure


Who are we?

Are you ready to take part in the upcoming AI revolution of the business world? If the answer is a resounding "yes," we have an extraordinary offer for you!

Aily Labs, founded in 2020, is an exciting and rapidly growing startup based in Munich, Barcelona, Madrid, New York and Cluj. With a team consisting of over 300+ passionate and skilled ML Engineers, Data Scientists and Developers, we are dedicated to our ambitious objective of democratizing AI.‚ÄØ

We have harnessed cutting-edge technology to develop an exceptional AI mobile app that goes beyond conventional solutions. By seamlessly providing immediate business insights, we are poised to revolutionise the corporate landscape.

Our vision is to establish ourselves as the preferred platform for AI-driven decision-making, setting new standards in the industry.‚ÄØWe firmly believe that our state-of-the-art technology empowers organisations to make faster and more intelligent choices.

By joining our team, you will have the opportunity to be at the forefront of this transformative movement, shaping the future of intelligent decision-making in remarkable ways.

What sets us apart?


We are an internationally diverse and young team with more than 30 nationalities.
We develop high-quality, beautiful software and thus create sustainable added value for our customers.
We pay competitive salaries and reward performance
We live an open feedback culture so that we can constantly reflect and improve.
We offer flexible remote work with free time management within the projects.
We enjoy new technologies, are open for innovative ideas and foster trial and error principles.
We give freedom for further training because lifelong learning is important to us.
We do cool and fun offsites (e.g. Ibiza. Kitzb√ºhel), and regular casual get-togethers.


About Us

Title: Data Scientist (m/f/d)
Description:
Why roadsurfer?


TEAM SPIRIT & TEAM EVENTS: Look forward to a collegial atmosphere with flat hierarchies, lots of fun and great team spirit, as well as regular team events such as joint sports sessions, pizza & beer evenings, etc.
FLEX WORK & WORKATION: You are flexible in terms of working hours. Our Flex Work Policy enables you to switch between office days and home office days and work from abroad in Europe for one month per year
PERSONAL DEVELOPMENT: We support your personal and professional development through an individual Growth Plan and our Inhouse Academy
CAMPER BUDGET: You get an annual camper budget to experience the #happyroadsurfing lifestyle for yourself
DISCOUNTS: Use our Corporate Benefits Platform, the Travel Industry Card and Family & Friends Discounts


The role - your passion


Developing and Implementing Predictive Models and Algorithms::
Design and develop advanced machine learning models for forecasting demand, pricing optimization, marketing mix modelling, predictive maintenance and other key business functions.
Implement models using Python and libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, nixtla, ‚Ä¶).
Ensure model accuracy and performance through rigorous validation and testing.
Experiment and deploy models in production following MLOps principles.
Data Preparation and Analysis:
Utilize data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI, Streamlit, Matplotlib) to present findings effectively.
Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) to uncover patterns, correlations, and insights that inform business decisions.
Collaboration and Stakeholder Engagement:
Work closely with business stakeholders to understand their data needs and translate them into technical requirements.
Provide actionable insights and recommendations through clear and concise communication of complex data results.
Guide stakeholders in implementing data-driven strategies and solutions.
Supporting Team Members:
Conduct peer reviews of code and data engineering approaches to ensure best practices and knowledge sharing.
Fostering a Data-Driven Culture:
Develop and deliver training sessions on data science topics, tools, and best practices to enhance data literacy across the organization.
Promote the use of modern data science tools and methodologies in decision-making processes through workshops, seminars, and other educational activities.

What You Need To Surf The Wave With Us


Educational Background:
You have successfully completed a bachelor‚Äôs degree, preferably in engineering, economics, physics, informatics, computer science, or other STEM-related areas.
Professional Experience:
You have at least two years of relevant experience as a data scientist, with a strong focus on business and operational analytics.
You have a proven track record of developing and deploying predictive models and algorithms in a business context.
Technical Skills:
You have advanced proficiency in SQL for data extraction and manipulation.
You are skilled in using data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or similar platforms.
You have extensive experience with programming languages such as Python or R, and are proficient in machine learning libraries (Scikit-Learn, XGBoost, Keras o Tensorflow).
Analytical and Decision-Making Abilities:
You are adept at making data-driven decisions and guiding stakeholders to achieve optimal strategies based on actionable insights.
You possess strong problem-solving skills and the ability to translate complex data science challenges into clear, actionable solutions.
Communication Skills:
You are business fluent in English, both written and verbal.
You can effectively communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders and collaborate with diverse teams.

Ready to surf?

We look forward to receiving your application! If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us at team@roadsurfer.com, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

ABOUT #ROADSURFER

We are more than Europe's largest campervan rental company. In 2021 we launched our platform roadsurfer spots in addition to our other products rent, abo and sales ‚Äì a platform where you can discover and book unique camping spots. But that‚Äôs only the beginning. We are growing fast, so hop on board and join us on our journey. The roadsurfer philosophy is simple: rent an RV, start your adventure, be happy. Come ride the wave with us!

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
About Our Organization:

Dow Jones is a global provider of news and business information, delivering content to consumers and organizations around the world across multiple formats, including print, digital, mobile and live events. Dow Jones has produced unrivaled quality content for more than 130 years and today has one of the world's largest news-gathering operations globally. It is home to leading publications and products including the flagship Wall Street Journal, America's largest newspaper by paid circulation; Barron's, MarketWatch, Mansion Global, Financial News, Investor's Business Daily, Factiva, Dow Jones Risk & Compliance, Dow Jones Newswires, OPIS and Chemical Market Analytics. Dow Jones is a division of News Corp (Nasdaq: NWS, NWSA; ASX: NWS, NWSLV).




About the Role:

Dow Jones is seeking a skilled Data Scientist to join our AI Engineering Team. You will design, construct, and maintain machine learning pipelines tailored for various AI applications, particularly focusing on Natural Language Processing. Collaborating with our engineering team, you'll integrate machine learning models, optimize performance, and ensure effective real-world application of machine learning solutions.

As a key team member, you will be involved in every aspect of the data science project development process, from data analysis and model selection to building proofs of concept and refining pipelines. You will leverage your expertise in statistical analysis and machine learning techniques to derive insights from data, address the organization's needs, and deliver tangible value through actionable outcomes.




You Will:

Collaborate within the AI Engineering Team to maintain robust data pipelines supporting various ML models, focusing on information retrieval applications.
Analyze and clean large datasets to optimize reusable ML models.
Partner with stakeholders across the company to translate business requirements into technical solutions.
Utilize analytical skills for NLP modeling, algorithm selection, and POC development.
Develop data enrichment pipelines to enhance insights aligned with strategic objectives.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to address the organization's data-driven needs, managing significant volumes of structured and unstructured data.
Integrate diverse ML models into systems, ensuring interoperability and performance optimization.
Lead efforts to optimize ML model performance through data analysis and validation in real-world applications.
Stay updated on AI, ML, and NLP advancements, incorporating emerging trends into processes.




You Have:

Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Data Science, or a related STEM field.
Mandatory experience with NLP and Machine Learning frameworks and libraries (e.g., PyTorch, HuggingFace, LangChain, spaCy, NLTK, scikit-learn, etc.).
At least 3 years of industrial experience in a data science or machine learning engineering role.
Strong programming skills in Python and/or another high-level language commonly used in machine learning.
Demonstrated understanding of various techniques for extracting structured data from unstructured sources, indicating expertise in information retrieval.
Familiarity with LLMs APIs for pre-processing, fine-tuning, and deploying models on cloud-based infrastructure.
Familiarity with cloud-based infrastructure and services (e.g., AWS, GCP, etc.).
Experience with version control systems such as Git.




Our Benefits

Comprehensive Healthcare Plans
Paid Time Off
Retirement Plans
Comprehensive Insurance Plans
Lifestyle programs & Wellness Resources
Education Benefits
Family Care Benefits & Caregiving Support
Commuter Transit Program
Subscription Discounts

HTML:
About Our Organization:

Dow Jones is a global provider of news and business information, delivering content to consumers and organizations around the world across multiple formats, including print, digital, mobile and live events. Dow Jones has produced unrivaled quality content for more than 130 years and today has one of the world's largest news-gathering operations globally. It is home to leading publications and products including the flagship Wall Street Journal, America's largest newspaper by paid circulation; Barron's, MarketWatch, Mansion Global, Financial News, Investor's Business Daily, Factiva, Dow Jones Risk & Compliance, Dow Jones Newswires, OPIS and Chemical Market Analytics. Dow Jones is a division of News Corp (Nasdaq: NWS, NWSA; ASX: NWS, NWSLV).


About the Role:

Dow Jones is seeking a skilled Data Scientist to join our AI Engineering Team. You will design, construct, and maintain machine learning pipelines tailored for various AI applications, particularly focusing on Natural Language Processing. Collaborating with our engineering team, you'll integrate machine learning models, optimize performance, and ensure effective real-world application of machine learning solutions.

As a key team member, you will be involved in every aspect of the data science project development process, from data analysis and model selection to building proofs of concept and refining pipelines. You will leverage your expertise in statistical analysis and machine learning techniques to derive insights from data, address the organization's needs, and deliver tangible value through actionable outcomes.


You Will:

  • Collaborate within the AI Engineering Team to maintain robust data pipelines supporting various ML models, focusing on information retrieval applications.
  • Analyze and clean large datasets to optimize reusable ML models.
  • Partner with stakeholders across the company to translate business requirements into technical solutions.
  • Utilize analytical skills for NLP modeling, algorithm selection, and POC development.
  • Develop data enrichment pipelines to enhance insights aligned with strategic objectives.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to address the organization's data-driven needs, managing significant volumes of structured and unstructured data.
  • Integrate diverse ML models into systems, ensuring interoperability and performance optimization.
  • Lead efforts to optimize ML model performance through data analysis and validation in real-world applications.
  • Stay updated on AI, ML, and NLP advancements, incorporating emerging trends into processes.


You Have:

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Data Science, or a related STEM field.
  • Mandatory experience with NLP and Machine Learning frameworks and libraries (e.g., PyTorch, HuggingFace, LangChain, spaCy, NLTK, scikit-learn, etc.).
  • At least 3 years of industrial experience in a data science or machine learning engineering role.
  • Strong programming skills in Python and/or another high-level language commonly used in machine learning.
  • Demonstrated understanding of various techniques for extracting structured data from unstructured sources, indicating expertise in information retrieval.
  • Familiarity with LLMs APIs for pre-processing, fine-tuning, and deploying models on cloud-based infrastructure.
  • Familiarity with cloud-based infrastructure and services (e.g., AWS, GCP, etc.).
  • Experience with version control systems such as Git.


Our Benefits

  • Comprehensive Healthcare Plans
  • Paid Time Off
  • Retirement Plans
  • Comprehensive Insurance Plans
  • Lifestyle programs & Wellness Resources
  • Education Benefits
  • Family Care Benefits & Caregiving Support

Title: Junior Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Junior ML EngineerAre you a Software Engineer looking to expand your expertise into the exciting world of Machine Learning and AI?

At MOSAIC, we specialize in predictive, optimization, and simulation solutions for the mobility and logistics sectors, leveraging Big Data, Machine Learning, and AI.About Us:Mosaic Factor is a Barcelona based startup with currently 12 employees.

We were founded in April of 2016 by an agile development believer, a technology guru and a sustainability dreamer who had a vision to exploit the power of data to improve the lives of others.

Our software-as-a-service products help understanding and improving flows of people and goods, respect people privacy and business sensitivity and soon develop more robust and fair AI.

Data is at centre of all our activities.

If you're looking for a startup company that values transparency, empathy, personal AND professional growth, but still knows how to have some fun - we're the company for you.

We're disrupting the world's largest market - the world you and we live in.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
I am currently working with an innovative technology company, where I have been chosen to expand their AI capabilities. In particular, I am looking for a talented Machine Learning Engineer based in Spain to design, develop, and deploy machine learning solutions that drive business innovation.




The best-matched Machine Learning Engineer will have the following experience and abilities:

Proven experience in building and deploying machine learning models to production.
Strong programming skills in Python and familiarity with ML frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Scikit-learn.
Experience with data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation.
Understanding of distributed systems and large-scale data processing (e.g., Apache Spark or similar).
Excellent problem-solving skills and a passion for staying up to date-with AI advancements.
Must have the right to work in the EU ‚Äì No sponsorship available.




If this looks like it could be of interest, then please apply or email me directly with any questions you may have!

Direct email: bart.townley@exploreltd.com

Title: AI/ML Engineer
Description:
Our cliente IAG is looking for a Software Engineer IA/ML




IAG is at the forefront of the AI revolution, driving innovation in ML, Cloud & Edge computing, and software engineering. Our projects span various sectors, including telecommunications, customer services, banking and insurance and leveraging the latest in AI technologies to solve real-world problems.




Role Overview:

We are recruiting an ambitious AI/ML Engineer to join our IAG technology team. You'll be instrumental in shaping our tech infrastructure, defining the strategic direction of our platforms, and overseeing their execution. This hands-on role involves leading the design and implementation of AI systems with a keen focus on scalability, efficiency, and impact.

You'll manage a skilled engineering team, foster cross-disciplinary cooperation, and play a key role in strategic planning. Your leadership will empower the team to make critical decisions and take full responsibility for innovative projects, with a strong emphasis on collaboration across engineering and business domains.




Key Responsibilities:

Design and deploy advanced machine learning models, focusing on Large Language Models (LLMs) to solve GenAI-based product problems.
Bring research concepts to implementation, creating AI-driven applications with direct business impact.
Collaborate closely with researchers, software engineers, and product managers to understand complex business challenges and deliver AI-powered solutions.
Implement scalable data pipelines and optimize models for performance and accuracy.
Ensure models are production-ready and maintain them to continue delivering value.
Stay updated with the latest developments in machine learning and AI.
Monitor and maintain deployed models, ensuring their effectiveness over time.
Navigate and prioritize tasks in an environment with loosely defined projects and competing deadlines.
Own problems end-to-end, acquiring necessary knowledge to get the job done.
Effectively manage multiple stakeholders, ensuring alignment of product development with business objectives.
You will work closely with a friendly, passionate innovative team located around the world.
You will have a key role and the opportunity to grow inside the organization.
You will experience awesome team spirit.
You will help to build, hire, and lead the dev team.




Qualifications:

Demonstrated experience in deep learning and transformer models.
Good Experience in Python, Java and JavaScript programming languages.
Proven experience in DevOps practices and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).
Solid understanding of software development lifecycle, agile methodologies, and lean startup principles.
Excellent problem-solving, leadership, and communication skills.
3 to 5 + years of relevant experience in AI/ML projects, with a focus on NLP and LLM.
Proven expertise in building fine-tuned LLMs and implementing the latest research techniques such as continuous pre-training, (Q)LoRA, RLHF, RLAIF, DPO, etc.
Strong foundation in data structures, algorithms, and software engineering principles.
Research publication in ML field




Education

A master‚Äôs degree in computer science, AI, mathematics, or a related field.
Master‚Äôs degree or PhD in ML Engineering, Mathematics or Statistics.




Languages

Excellent conversational and written knowledge in English (C1 level minimum).
French and Spanish language skills are a bonus.




Tools and Applications

ML frameworks and tools: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face.
ML operations tools: Weights & Biases (wandb), MLflow.
Data visualization tools: Matplotlib, Power BI.
Version control systems and collaborative development platforms.




Why Join Us?

Be part of a forward-thinking company that values innovation, creativity, and clean code.
Work on projects that have a real-world impact, leveraging cutting-edge technologies.
Collaborate with a global team of experts passionate about AI and new technologies.
Opportunities for personal and professional growth in a supportive and dynamic environment.




If you're ready to lead the charge in AI, apply to join our team!

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Who We Are¬†

At Proqio, we‚Äôre revolutionizing mining and infrastructure project management with cutting-edge software technology. Our platform helps civil infrastructure and mining companies gain complete visibility and control over their operations, ensuring that they are safer, smarter, and more efficient.¬†

¬†

Headquartered in Spain and expanding rapidly worldwide, we‚Äôre looking for a driven, ambitious Data Scientist to expand our AI team.¬†

¬†

If you're looking for a high-energy role where you can help modernize the infrastructure industry with cutting-edge technology, this is your chance to join a fast-growing team where your work truly matters.¬†¬†

¬†

¬†

Role Description

This is a full-time role for a Data Scientist at Proqio. The Data Scientist will be responsible for tasks such as data science, statistics, data analytics, and data analysis to extract meaningful insights from complex infrastructure data.

¬†

What We‚Äôre Looking For¬†

¬†

Core Programming & Libraries

Python: Proficient in Python with libraries like NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib/Seaborn and Streamlit (3 years) (mandatory)
Deep Learning: Experience with TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Keras (1 year)
Forecast: Proficient with libreries like skforecast, statsmodels, pmdarima, xgboost (3 year) (mandatory)

Generative AI & NLP

LLM & Transformers: Fine-tuning and prompt engineering using Hugging Face Transformers, OpenAI GPT APIs, BERT. (1 year) (mandatory)
Agents: LangChain, LangGraph, llama Index (1 year) (mandatory)
Generative Models: Familiarity with GANs, diffusion models, or VAEs (1 year)

Machine Learning & Data Science

Algorithms & Statistical Analysis: Supervised/unsupervised learning, model optimization, hypothesis testing (3 years) (mandatory)
Data Engineering: Data wrangling, ETL processes, and proficiency with SQL/NoSQL databases (2 years) (mandatory)

Cloud & MLOps

Cloud Platforms: AWS, GCP, or Azure for scalable solutions. Preferably AWS (2 years) (mandatory)
DevOps Tools: Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines for model deployment and monitoring. Preferably GitHub Actions (2 years)




Benefits:¬†

Join a leading international company involved in iconic global construction projects.¬†
A permanent contract with a competitive salary.¬†
Opportunities for professional growth in a supportive environment.¬†
Great culture and a working environment with a flexible schedule and focus on mental well-being.¬†
Regular team-building events, training programs, and performance reviews.¬†

¬†

Why You‚Äôll Love Us:¬†

You‚Äôll become part of a growing, energetic company with a commitment to innovation and excellence. Proqio values diversity, inclusion, and the personal and professional development of its team members in a truly international setting.¬†

¬†

Application Process:¬†

All applications must be submitted in English. We are committed to a transparent recruitment process, and your data will only be used for recruitment purposes and will be handled with utmost security.¬†

HTML:
Who We Are 

At Proqio, we‚Äôre revolutionizing mining and infrastructure project management with cutting-edge software technology. Our platform helps civil infrastructure and mining companies gain complete visibility and control over their operations, ensuring that they are safer, smarter, and more efficient. 

 

Headquartered in Spain and expanding rapidly worldwide, we‚Äôre looking for a driven, ambitious Data Scientist to expand our AI team. 

 

If you're looking for a high-energy role where you can help modernize the infrastructure industry with cutting-edge technology, this is your chance to join a fast-growing team where your work truly matters.  

 

 

Role Description

This is a full-time role for a Data Scientist at Proqio. The Data Scientist will be responsible for tasks such as data science, statistics, data analytics, and data analysis to extract meaningful insights from complex infrastructure data.

 

What We‚Äôre Looking For 

 

Core Programming & Libraries

  • Python: Proficient in Python with libraries like NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib/Seaborn and Streamlit (3 years) (mandatory)
  • Deep Learning: Experience with TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Keras (1 year)
  • Forecast: Proficient with libreries like skforecast, statsmodels, pmdarima, xgboost (3 year) (mandatory)

Generative AI & NLP

  • LLM & Transformers: Fine-tuning and prompt engineering using Hugging Face Transformers, OpenAI GPT APIs, BERT. (1 year) (mandatory)
  • Agents: LangChain, LangGraph, llama Index (1 year) (mandatory)
  • Generative Models: Familiarity with GANs, diffusion models, or VAEs (1 year)

Machine Learning & Data Science

  • Algorithms & Statistical Analysis: Supervised/unsupervised learning, model optimization, hypothesis testing (3 years) (mandatory)
  • Data Engineering: Data wrangling, ETL processes, and proficiency with SQL/NoSQL databases (2 years) (mandatory)

Cloud & MLOps

  • Cloud Platforms: AWS, GCP, or Azure for scalable solutions. Preferably AWS (2 years) (mandatory)
  • DevOps Tools: Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines for model deployment and monitoring. Preferably GitHub Actions (2 years)


Benefits: 

  • Join a leading international company involved in iconic global construction projects. 
  • A permanent contract with a competitive salary. 
  • Opportunities for professional growth in a supportive environment. 
  • Great culture and a working environment with a flexible schedule and focus on mental well-being. 
  • Regular team-building events, training programs, and performance reviews. 

 

Why You‚Äôll Love Us: 

You‚Äôll become part of a growing, energetic company with a commitment to innovation and excellence. Proqio values diversity, inclusion, and the personal and professional development of its team members in a truly international setting. 

 

Application Process: 

All applications must be submitted in English. We are committed to a transparent recruitment process, and your data will only be used for recruitment purposes and will be handled with utmost security.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
At Capitole Consulting, we keep growing, and we want you to be part of the family!

We are looking for a Senior Data Scientist for the development of AI models to work on an international project with 5 years of experience Must be able to write structured and quality Python code and work together with MLEs to move to production models.




What will we value in your application?




- Advanced Python

- Databricks (desirable, not a must)

- Knowledge of ML libraries (scikit-learn, pytorch, etc)

- Data processing (pandas)




It will be a plus:




- Cloud platforms (AWS-Sagemaker/Azure-ML)

- Containers and orchestration (Docker/Kubernetes)

- NLP or GenAI/LLM knowledge




Languages: High level of English or native.

The position offers a hybrid work arrangement, with a requirement to be present in the Barcelona office 2 times a week.

We are great, but with you, we will be even greater üòä. That is why you will have:

- ü•ó Flexible remuneration package

- üèÄ Great discounts at sports centers (AndJoy)

- üë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è Free private health insurance

- üìà Monthly follow-ups with your team to have continuous feedback

- üçª Team Buildings every two months. You can't miss the Pool Partyüíß and our Christmas dinnerüéÑ

- üõçÔ∏è Discounts in international brands for employees (Club Capitole)

- You will have the opportunity to meet the whole family through our Technology communities, to share your knowledge and ideas. Knowledge exchange is key to us!

And have a look to how others think we are üëÄ Glassdoor

We are excited to meet you! üòé

Title: AI engineer (w/m)
Description:
We are Deutsche Telekom IT Spain, located in a digital, scientific, and cultural hub of Spain - Valencia. We work as part of T-Systems Iberia though with a separate structure and projects. Our team is growing, and we are looking forward to meeting talented employees!

With our highly skilled engineers and experts, we are committed to continue developing the culture of creativity and agility, foster innovations, and be an international tech center.

We are looking for AI engineer (developer) to join our international team!




We are developing an innovative platform for user assistance utilizing generative AI technology. Our goal is to create intelligent, responsive, and adaptable assistance that enhances user interaction and provide seamless customer service experiences. As an AI Engineer, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the platform‚Äôs AI capabilities, leveraging state-of-the-art machine learning techniques to deliver solutions.




Key Responsibilities:




Engage with customers real-world problems, refine use cases, define AI-based solutions tailored to their needs.
Research technical feasibility, develop PoCs (proof of concept) before full-scale implementation.
Design, implement, maintain MVP solutions based on the existing microservice architecture and Azure Cloud
Evaluate quality of solution using AI metrics to ensure high performance.
Apply techniques and concepts of prompt engineering, multi agents, search over unstructured data, RAG, and model fine-tuning.




Qualifications:




Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field.
Proven experience in Python software development for 2+ years with strong understanding of:
Core Python concepts and best practices.
API frameworks: FastAPI, Flask, Quart
Microservice architecture and design patterns
Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB), vector DB (FAISS, ChromaDB)
Experience with search engines and cloud storages (ElasticSearch, AWS S3, Azure Blob Storage)
Strong background in ETL pipelines for unstructured data processing (web scraping, document parsing, OCR, noise removal) and text preprocessing (tokenization, stop-words, stemming, normalization)
Hands-on experience with NLP, including techniques like text generation, sentiment analysis, categorization, chunking, vectorization, embeddings, and entity recognition.
Experience in training, fine-tuning small/large language models.
Familiarity with building AI applications using LangChain, LlamaIndex, AI Agent frameworks (LangChain, AutoGen, Swarm, others)
Experience in LLM quality assessment with AI KPI metrics (Ragas)
Experience in Azure AI services / Google Vertex / Amazon (Cognitive Search, Vertex AI Matching Engine, Amazon Kendra)
Experience in Dockerization (Dockerfile, DockerCompose)
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication skills (English is project language) and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.







ü§≤What we offer:

International, positive, dynamic, friendly, and motivated work environment.
Modern office in the city centre.
Flexible working schedule, hybrid.
Excellent opportunities for professional and personal development.
Flexible Compensation Plan.
Life and accident insurance.

Title: Data Scientist - Spain
Place: Las Rozas de Madrid, Community of Madrid, Spain
Description:
Who we are:

Allot is an industry leader in network security and visibility. A global, growing company in cyber-security with a strong Tier1 customer base. We embrace an Agile way of working, priding ourselves on being fast, diverse and dynamic. We are real team players who are ready to go the extra mile to succeed. We believe that anyone can make an impact and together our team spirit makes all the difference. This is your opportunity to develop, professionally and personally.

We‚Äôre looking for a Data Scientist to be part of our Research team.

What you‚Äôll do:


Research and implement identification/detection algorithms/signatures for encrypted traffic
Develop innovative models to improve the cybersecurity solutions of Allot products.
Develop automation scripts and tools to aid in research and analysis tasks


Additional Information


Solid competency in statistics, and working knowledge of data mining algorithms including decision trees, probability networks, association rules, clustering, regression, and neural networks
A motivated and creative problem solver, self-learning & results-oriented.
Experience with APIs, framework for Neuronal Network (TensorFlow, Torch)
Good understanding of network architecture and protocols (e.g. SSL, HTTP).
Experience with Linux environments.
Experience with one or more general-purpose programming languages including but not limited to C/C++ and Python.


Requirements:

Preferred Experience

Ph.D. in Computer Science, Statistics, Operations Research, or related technical field.

Experience working in Artificial Intelligence, Graph Theory, Natural Language Understanding, Machine Learning, Algorithmic Foundations of Optimization, or Data Mining.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
I am currently working with an innovative technology company, where I have been chosen to expand their AI capabilities. In particular, I am looking for a talented Machine Learning Engineer based in Spain to design, develop, and deploy machine learning solutions that drive business innovation.




The best-matched Machine Learning Engineer will have the following experience and abilities:

Proven experience in building and deploying machine learning models to production.
Strong programming skills in Python and familiarity with ML frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Scikit-learn.
Experience with data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation.
Understanding of distributed systems and large-scale data processing (e.g., Apache Spark or similar).
Excellent problem-solving skills and a passion for staying up to date-with AI advancements.
Must have the right to work in the EU ‚Äì No sponsorship available.




If this looks like it could be of interest, then please apply or email me directly with any questions you may have!

Direct email: bart.townley@exploreltd.com

Title: AI/ML Engineer
Description:
Our cliente IAG is looking for a Software Engineer IA/ML




IAG is at the forefront of the AI revolution, driving innovation in ML, Cloud & Edge computing, and software engineering. Our projects span various sectors, including telecommunications, customer services, banking and insurance and leveraging the latest in AI technologies to solve real-world problems.




Role Overview:

We are recruiting an ambitious AI/ML Engineer to join our IAG technology team. You'll be instrumental in shaping our tech infrastructure, defining the strategic direction of our platforms, and overseeing their execution. This hands-on role involves leading the design and implementation of AI systems with a keen focus on scalability, efficiency, and impact.

You'll manage a skilled engineering team, foster cross-disciplinary cooperation, and play a key role in strategic planning. Your leadership will empower the team to make critical decisions and take full responsibility for innovative projects, with a strong emphasis on collaboration across engineering and business domains.




Key Responsibilities:

Design and deploy advanced machine learning models, focusing on Large Language Models (LLMs) to solve GenAI-based product problems.
Bring research concepts to implementation, creating AI-driven applications with direct business impact.
Collaborate closely with researchers, software engineers, and product managers to understand complex business challenges and deliver AI-powered solutions.
Implement scalable data pipelines and optimize models for performance and accuracy.
Ensure models are production-ready and maintain them to continue delivering value.
Stay updated with the latest developments in machine learning and AI.
Monitor and maintain deployed models, ensuring their effectiveness over time.
Navigate and prioritize tasks in an environment with loosely defined projects and competing deadlines.
Own problems end-to-end, acquiring necessary knowledge to get the job done.
Effectively manage multiple stakeholders, ensuring alignment of product development with business objectives.
You will work closely with a friendly, passionate innovative team located around the world.
You will have a key role and the opportunity to grow inside the organization.
You will experience awesome team spirit.
You will help to build, hire, and lead the dev team.




Qualifications:

Demonstrated experience in deep learning and transformer models.
Good Experience in Python, Java and JavaScript programming languages.
Proven experience in DevOps practices and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).
Solid understanding of software development lifecycle, agile methodologies, and lean startup principles.
Excellent problem-solving, leadership, and communication skills.
3 to 5 + years of relevant experience in AI/ML projects, with a focus on NLP and LLM.
Proven expertise in building fine-tuned LLMs and implementing the latest research techniques such as continuous pre-training, (Q)LoRA, RLHF, RLAIF, DPO, etc.
Strong foundation in data structures, algorithms, and software engineering principles.
Research publication in ML field




Education

A master‚Äôs degree in computer science, AI, mathematics, or a related field.
Master‚Äôs degree or PhD in ML Engineering, Mathematics or Statistics.




Languages

Excellent conversational and written knowledge in English (C1 level minimum).
French and Spanish language skills are a bonus.




Tools and Applications

ML frameworks and tools: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face.
ML operations tools: Weights & Biases (wandb), MLflow.
Data visualization tools: Matplotlib, Power BI.
Version control systems and collaborative development platforms.




Why Join Us?

Be part of a forward-thinking company that values innovation, creativity, and clean code.
Work on projects that have a real-world impact, leveraging cutting-edge technologies.
Collaborate with a global team of experts passionate about AI and new technologies.
Opportunities for personal and professional growth in a supportive and dynamic environment.




If you're ready to lead the charge in AI, apply to join our team!

Title: Senior AI/ML Engineer
Description:
Intetics Inc., a global technology company providing custom software application development, distributed professional teams, software product quality assessment, and "all-things-digital" solutions, is seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior AI/ML Engineer to join our dynamic team.

Responsibilities:


Conducting research and proposing high-level solutions
Participating in pre-sale activities
Working on an internal product by applying classical ML algorithms or lightweight PyTorch models for tasks such as document classification, predicting employee turnover risk, matching employees to new roles, forecasting sales trends, and identifying high-potential leads
Engaging in various commercial projects



Requirements


Experience with data collection for model training, from the stage of requirements definition together with the client till datasets forming
Experience with classic Computer Vision algorithms and image processing
Strong knowledge of linear algebra and projective geometry
Experience with classic ML algorithms
PyTorch (required), OpenCV (required)
Experience with 3D data, spatial data, point clouds e.t.c
Experience with the healthcare domain is mandatory. Experience with genomic and transcriptomic data would be a strong advantage
Knowledge and interest in modern SOTA algorithms and approaches
Experience in studying scientific papers and deploying solutions based on them (mandatory)
Experience in pre-sales activities will be a big plus
Strong communication and presentation skills for explaining complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences would be a strong advantage



Benefits


Paid Time Off (36 paid days per year)
Work From Home

HTML:
Intetics Inc., a global technology company providing custom software application development, distributed professional teams, software product quality assessment, and "all-things-digital" solutions, is seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior AI/ML Engineer to join our dynamic team.

Responsibilities:

  • Conducting research and proposing high-level solutions
  • Participating in pre-sale activities
  • Working on an internal product by applying classical ML algorithms or lightweight PyTorch models for tasks such as document classification, predicting employee turnover risk, matching employees to new roles, forecasting sales trends, and identifying high-potential leads
  • Engaging in various commercial projects


Requirements

  • Experience with data collection for model training, from the stage of requirements definition together with the client till datasets forming
  • Experience with classic Computer Vision algorithms and image processing
  • Strong knowledge of linear algebra and projective geometry
  • Experience with classic ML algorithms
  • PyTorch (required), OpenCV (required)
  • Experience with 3D data, spatial data, point clouds e.t.c
  • Experience with the healthcare domain is mandatory. Experience with genomic and transcriptomic data would be a strong advantage
  • Knowledge and interest in modern SOTA algorithms and approaches
  • Experience in studying scientific papers and deploying solutions based on them (mandatory)
  • Experience in pre-sales activities will be a big plus
  • Strong communication and presentation skills for explaining complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences would be a strong advantage


Benefits

  • Paid Time Off (36 paid days per year)
  • Work From Home
  • Training & Development
  • Partial medical compensation

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Who We Are¬†

At Proqio, we‚Äôre revolutionizing mining and infrastructure project management with cutting-edge software technology. Our platform helps civil infrastructure and mining companies gain complete visibility and control over their operations, ensuring that they are safer, smarter, and more efficient.¬†

¬†

Headquartered in Spain and expanding rapidly worldwide, we‚Äôre looking for a driven, ambitious Data Scientist to expand our AI team.¬†

¬†

If you're looking for a high-energy role where you can help modernize the infrastructure industry with cutting-edge technology, this is your chance to join a fast-growing team where your work truly matters.¬†¬†

¬†

¬†

Role Description

This is a full-time role for a Data Scientist at Proqio. The Data Scientist will be responsible for tasks such as data science, statistics, data analytics, and data analysis to extract meaningful insights from complex infrastructure data.

¬†

What We‚Äôre Looking For¬†

¬†

Core Programming & Libraries

Python: Proficient in Python with libraries like NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib/Seaborn and Streamlit (3 years) (mandatory)
Deep Learning: Experience with TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Keras (1 year)
Forecast: Proficient with libreries like skforecast, statsmodels, pmdarima, xgboost (3 year) (mandatory)

Generative AI & NLP

LLM & Transformers: Fine-tuning and prompt engineering using Hugging Face Transformers, OpenAI GPT APIs, BERT. (1 year) (mandatory)
Agents: LangChain, LangGraph, llama Index (1 year) (mandatory)
Generative Models: Familiarity with GANs, diffusion models, or VAEs (1 year)

Machine Learning & Data Science

Algorithms & Statistical Analysis: Supervised/unsupervised learning, model optimization, hypothesis testing (3 years) (mandatory)
Data Engineering: Data wrangling, ETL processes, and proficiency with SQL/NoSQL databases (2 years) (mandatory)

Cloud & MLOps

Cloud Platforms: AWS, GCP, or Azure for scalable solutions. Preferably AWS (2 years) (mandatory)
DevOps Tools: Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines for model deployment and monitoring. Preferably GitHub Actions (2 years)




Benefits:¬†

Join a leading international company involved in iconic global construction projects.¬†
A permanent contract with a competitive salary.¬†
Opportunities for professional growth in a supportive environment.¬†
Great culture and a working environment with a flexible schedule and focus on mental well-being.¬†
Regular team-building events, training programs, and performance reviews.¬†

¬†

Why You‚Äôll Love Us:¬†

You‚Äôll become part of a growing, energetic company with a commitment to innovation and excellence. Proqio values diversity, inclusion, and the personal and professional development of its team members in a truly international setting.¬†

¬†

Application Process:¬†

All applications must be submitted in English. We are committed to a transparent recruitment process, and your data will only be used for recruitment purposes and will be handled with utmost security.¬†

HTML:
Who We Are 

At Proqio, we‚Äôre revolutionizing mining and infrastructure project management with cutting-edge software technology. Our platform helps civil infrastructure and mining companies gain complete visibility and control over their operations, ensuring that they are safer, smarter, and more efficient. 

 

Headquartered in Spain and expanding rapidly worldwide, we‚Äôre looking for a driven, ambitious Data Scientist to expand our AI team. 

 

If you're looking for a high-energy role where you can help modernize the infrastructure industry with cutting-edge technology, this is your chance to join a fast-growing team where your work truly matters.  

 

 

Role Description

This is a full-time role for a Data Scientist at Proqio. The Data Scientist will be responsible for tasks such as data science, statistics, data analytics, and data analysis to extract meaningful insights from complex infrastructure data.

 

What We‚Äôre Looking For 

 

Core Programming & Libraries

  • Python: Proficient in Python with libraries like NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib/Seaborn and Streamlit (3 years) (mandatory)
  • Deep Learning: Experience with TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Keras (1 year)
  • Forecast: Proficient with libreries like skforecast, statsmodels, pmdarima, xgboost (3 year) (mandatory)

Generative AI & NLP

  • LLM & Transformers: Fine-tuning and prompt engineering using Hugging Face Transformers, OpenAI GPT APIs, BERT. (1 year) (mandatory)
  • Agents: LangChain, LangGraph, llama Index (1 year) (mandatory)
  • Generative Models: Familiarity with GANs, diffusion models, or VAEs (1 year)

Machine Learning & Data Science

  • Algorithms & Statistical Analysis: Supervised/unsupervised learning, model optimization, hypothesis testing (3 years) (mandatory)
  • Data Engineering: Data wrangling, ETL processes, and proficiency with SQL/NoSQL databases (2 years) (mandatory)

Cloud & MLOps

  • Cloud Platforms: AWS, GCP, or Azure for scalable solutions. Preferably AWS (2 years) (mandatory)
  • DevOps Tools: Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines for model deployment and monitoring. Preferably GitHub Actions (2 years)


Benefits: 

  • Join a leading international company involved in iconic global construction projects. 
  • A permanent contract with a competitive salary. 
  • Opportunities for professional growth in a supportive environment. 
  • Great culture and a working environment with a flexible schedule and focus on mental well-being. 
  • Regular team-building events, training programs, and performance reviews. 

 

Why You‚Äôll Love Us: 

You‚Äôll become part of a growing, energetic company with a commitment to innovation and excellence. Proqio values diversity, inclusion, and the personal and professional development of its team members in a truly international setting. 

 

Application Process: 

All applications must be submitted in English. We are committed to a transparent recruitment process, and your data will only be used for recruitment purposes and will be handled with utmost security.

Title: Senior Data Scientist Producto
Description:
En MANGO, estamos comprometidos en convertirnos en una empresa impulsada por datos y estamos formando un equipo de Data y Advanced Analytics compuesto por m√°s de 50 profesionales. El squad de personalizaci√≥n, que crea algoritmos para ofrecer experiencias personalizadas y recomendaciones de productos en tiempo real en mango.com; el squad de Pricing, que optimiza promociones y descuentos para mejorar el margen de la compa√±√≠a. Entender√°s los problemas/dificultades que se encuentran los diferentes departamentos de planificaci√≥n, compras, distribuci√≥n, etc.

Redactar√°s statements of work b√°sicos de proyectos con todas las partes implicadas.
Desarrollar√°s proyectos basados en algoritmos de Machine Learning en entornos de producci√≥n.

Utilizar√°s tecnolog√≠as Big Data para manejar grandes vol√∫menes de datos y mejorar la eficiencia de los modelos.







¬øQU√â ESPERAMOS DE TI?

Grado/M√°ster en Ing. Inform√°tica, Ing. Ciencia de Datos, o similar.
Al menos 5 a√±os de experiencia desarrollando en Python u otro lenguaje orientado a objetos.
Experiencia en el uso y puesta en producci√≥n de librer√≠as enfocadas a Deep Learning como TensorFlow o PyTorch.
S√≥lidos conocimientos en Machine Learning y redes neuronales. Arquitecturas y m√©todos de evaluaci√≥n.
Experiencia en prototipar soluciones software basadas en Machine Learning y capacidad para definir la experimentaci√≥n necesaria en este tipo de proyectos. Se valora positivamente haber liderado el desarrollo end-to-end de un proyecto desde la fase de prototipo hasta la puesta en producci√≥n y mantenimiento.
Se valora muy positivamente el conocimiento en buenas pr√°cticas de programaci√≥n y desarrollo de software: tests, automatizaciones, pipelines en CI (Jenkins), etc.
Se valora haber trabajado con servicios cloud mencionados anteriormente.
Persona comprometida, proactiva, curiosa, con ganas de innovar y una mentalidad hands-on.







¬øQU√â NOS HACE ESPECIALES?




Incorporaci√≥n inmediata con contrato indefinido.
Ofrecemos horario flexible (puedes entrar de 8 a 9.30 y salir de 17 a 18.30) con jornada intensiva todos los viernes (puedes entrar de 8 a 9 y salir de 14 a 15) y la mayor√≠a de las vigilias de festivos
Nuestras oficinas se encuentran en Palau- Solita i Plegamans.
Posibilidad de teletrabajo en un 50%.
35% de descuento en todas nuestras l√≠neas
Te podr√°s formar a nivel t√©cnico en plataformas como O'Reilly, entre otras, as√≠ como en idiomas, y en habilidades para tu desarrollo personal. Te acompa√±amos para que sigas creciendo a nivel profesional y personal!
Pol√≠tica de referrals, podr√°s participar en la incorporaci√≥n de talento a nuestros equipos, ¬°y te recompensaremos por ello!

Servicio de fisioterapia en las oficinas centrales, as√≠ como sala de fitness y vestuarios por si te gusta hacer deporte en tu tiempo libre
Workshops, meetups, comunidades de pr√°cticas, team buildings y company meetings
Paquete de retribuci√≥n flexible con ventajas fiscales: seguro m√©dico, formaci√≥n, descuento comedor, guarder√≠as etc
Servicio de comedor y cocina en las instalaciones de la central. La empresa subvenciona parte del men√∫ diario, as√≠ como los art√≠culos de cafeter√≠a.
Servicio m√©dico propio en las instalaciones de la central.
Formar√°s parte de una empresa l√≠der en el sector de la moda, din√°mica, en plena innovaci√≥n, con gran concienciaci√≥n y realizando acciones hacia la sostenibilidad
Ambiente de trabajo cercano, inspirador y ambicioso, trabajar√°s con un gran equipo que va en la misma direcci√≥n para conseguir los mejores resultados
