Title: AI Engineer Medior ‚Äì Senior
Description:
Esta √© uma posi√ß√£o remota.

We are seeking a talented AI Systems Engineer to join our dynamic team and contribute to the development and deployment of advanced AI solutions.

Must have


Setup of AI systems infrastructure in Azure cloud.
Experience with data pre-processing and feature engineering based on business and model requirements. Particularly for GenAI processes.
MLOps practices. Prepare CI/CD pipelines for building, testing, and deploying code.
Evaluate, deploy, and monitor AI models, including GPT-based systems.
Development of knowledge assistants in Microsoft Copilot Studio.
Experience with natural language understanding (NLP), computer vision, and deep learning.
Experience with Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), vector-based search, among others.
Experience with Large Language Model (LLM) agents, for example the ReAct methodology.


Business oriented


Transforming advanced AI concepts into tangible business solutions.
Design, develop, and provide guidance on setting up data architectures and data management frameworks for AI systems.
Evaluation of data and infrastructure requirements for AI systems.
Design AI systems and respective functional architectures.


Requisitos


Data management or pipelines skills, for example working with Data Factory, Fabric, among others.
Experience with the deployment of Azure resources via Bicep files.
Experience with deploying containerized applications with REST interfaces (FastAPI) via DevOps pipelines.
Frontend development experience.


Technology stack


Cloud services: Azure
Power platform: Copilot Studio
Version control: Git, Azure DevOps
Programming language: Python
Generative AI: OpenAI, Azure OpenAI (GPT, Embeddings)
Others: Azure Custom Vision, Bing Search, Azure Functions, Azure Cognitive Search, Copilot Studio, Streamlit, LangChain, CosmosDB, Document Intelligence, FastAPI, Shell, Bicep, Docker, Private Endpoints, Langfuse


Vantagens

Remote work

Food ticket

Health insurance

Training and access to certification vouchers

Work-life balance initiatives

Referral program

Birthday off

Give back day ‚Äì enjoy a day to give back to society!

Title: UAS (Drone) Swarm AI Engineer
Description:
Are you ready to revolutionise the world with TEKEVER? üöÄüåç

Join us, the European leader in unmanned technology, where cutting-edge advancements meet unparalleled innovation. We offer a unique surveillance-as-a-service solution that provides real-time intelligence, enhancing maritime safety and saving lives. TEKEVER is setting new standards in intelligence services, data and AI technologies.

Become part of a dynamic team transforming maritime surveillance and making a significant impact on global safety. üåê

At TEKEVER, our mission is to provide limitless support through mission-oriented game-changers, delivering the right information at the right time to facilitate critical decisions.

If you‚Äôre passionate about technology and eager to shape the future, TEKEVER is the place for you! üëáüèªüéØ

Job Overview

As a Drone Swarm AI Engineer, you will be at the forefront of developing and implementing AI algorithms that enable coordinated behavior and autonomous decision-making in swarms of drones. You will work on cutting-edge projects that require innovative thinking and a deep understanding of AI, robotics and drone technologies. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in AI, machine learning and robotics, with specific experience in swarm intelligence and multi-agent systems.

What Will Be Your Responsibilities


Algorithm Development: Design and develop AI algorithms for swarm intelligence, enabling drones to communicate, collaborate and perform tasks autonomously in a coordinated manner.
Simulation and Testing: Create and utilize simulation environments to test and validate swarm behaviors, ensuring robustness and efficiency before deployment in real-world scenarios.
Real-Time Processing: Implement real-time data processing and decision-making algorithms to facilitate dynamic adaptation of the swarm to changing environments and mission requirements.
System Integration: Integrate AI algorithms with drone hardware and software systems, ensuring seamless operation and communication within the swarm.
Optimization: Optimize swarm algorithms for performance, scalability and energy efficiency, considering the constraints of onboard processing power and battery life.
Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including hardware engineers, software developers and field operators, to define requirements and deliver solutions that meet project goals.
Research and Innovation: Stay current with the latest advancements in AI, swarm robotics and multi-agent systems and apply new techniques to enhance the capabilities of our drone swarms.
Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation of algorithms, simulation results and system configurations for future reference and reproducibility.
Field Testing: Conduct, together with our Ops teams, field tests and demonstrations to evaluate the performance of drone swarms in real-world conditions, making adjustments as necessary to improve functionality.


Profile And Requirements


Education: Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Robotics, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.
Experience: 3+ years of experience in AI, machine learning, robotics, or a related field, with specific experience in swarm intelligence or multi-agent systems.
Technical Skills:
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, as well as C++, Java or Rust.
Experience with machine learning frameworks and libraries such as TensorFlow, TensorFlow Lite, TensorRT, PyTorch, PyTorch Mobile, or scikit-learn.
Strong knowledge of swarm intelligence algorithms and multi-agent systems.
Familiarity with robotics software frameworks such as ROS (Robot Operating System).
Understanding of real-time operating systems (RTOS) and embedded systems.
Experience with simulation tools like Gazebo, Webots, or custom simulation environments.
Understanding of communication protocols and networking for drone-to-drone and drone-to-ground communication.
Familiarity with edge computing platforms and hardware accelerators (e.g., NVIDIA Jetson, Google Coral, ARM Cortex), with focus on NVIDIA Jetson Orin.
Experience in deploying and optimizing models for edge computing environments.
Analytical Skills: Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to design innovative solutions to complex problems.
Communication: Strong verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with technical (software, AI, embedded systems, hardware) and non-technical stakeholders.
Attention to Detail: High attention to detail and a commitment to ensuring the accuracy and quality of work.
Adaptability: Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

What We Have To Offer You


An excellent work environment and an opportunity to create a real impact in the world;
A truly high-tech, state-of-the-art engineering company with flat structure and no politics;
Working with the very latest technologies in Data & AI, including Edge AI, Swarming - both within our software platforms and within our embedded on-board systems;
Flexible work arrangements;
Professional development opportunities;
Collaborative and inclusive work environment;
Salary compatible with the level of proven experience.


Do you want to know more about us ?

Visit our LinkedIn page at https://www.linkedin.com/company/tekever/

Title: Full-Stack Engineer (Remote)
Description:
What‚Äôs Promptly in a nutshell

Promptly is building the first patient-centered global evidence network, offering real world data sharing and monetization capabilities. Together with a selected network of Partners, we generate new knowledge from harmonized datasets, augmented with the collection of longitudinal patient-reported data and patient-generated digital biomarkers within a secure and privacy-preserving environment. We deliver valuable insights to leading health systems, payers and life-science companies across multiple therapeutic areas, including cardiometabolic, oncology, and immunology. Operating in 10 countries, we promote better healthcare at lower costs for thousands of new patients every day through the use of Real World Evidence.

We answer the question ‚Äì is this patient treatment the best it could possibly be?

What‚Äôs our purpose

We exist to empower every patient and every health organization on the planet with evidence on the outcomes of care!

Why do we get up in the morning? Well, most healthcare professionals have chosen to work in healthcare driven by their desire to make a difference in patients‚Äô lives. And so have we! We have chosen to follow this calling by addressing the biggest problem in healthcare: the lack of real-world evidence on the outcomes of care.

For us, society denying patients better care due to lack of access to data is unethical, in a world where technology improved so many aspects of our world. Making the right evidence available to healthcare organizations to help prevent one lost life, one care complication, one failed treatment is the moral obligation that big tech companies have ‚Äì it‚Äôs our Hippocratic Oath.

At Promptly, everything we do is driven by our core purpose: to promote better healthcare at lower costs for patients every day, by making health outcomes available.

The Momentum

We are scaling fast and (certainly not) breaking things, backed by renowned VC investors. In the next two years, we will enter new markets in Europe and Latin America, reaching out to new patients with multiple healthcare needs, whom we will help live their lives to their fullest potential. Exciting stuff!

We are looking for a‚ÄØ Full-stack engineer ‚ÄØto join our engineering team. ‚ÄØIf you are looking for an opportunity where career-minded professionals can achieve success while bringing their best and whole selves to work each day, Promptly may be the company you have been looking for.

What you‚Äôll be expected to do


Write good, clean and testable code
Attention to detail
Being proud of the code you write and the product you build
Review code and help each other being better
Being self-driven, have a proactive mind and sense of ownership
Collaborate with a team of other talented people
Use best practices and excel at what you do
Troubleshooting and problem-solving using high performant solutions
Choose the right tool/tech-stack for the job



Qualifications And Work Experience


Proficient on the base Full-Stack development technologies, including HTML5/CSS3/JavaScript, Typescript, Node, Python, Django, Kafka
A person with proven knowledge and experience in a Frontend JavaScript library like React, Vue, NextJs
Someone with solid knowledge of testing tools such as Jest and React Testing
A professional with solid knowledge in GIT and its features.
Experience with OO programming and software design patterns
Experience with Continuous Delivery development process is a plus
Experience with cloud provides like AWS, GCP, Azure is a plus
A person with proven experience in working collaboratively within a multi-team environment, dealing with extensive code bases.
Proficient in written and spoken English.



Personality and behavioral traits

If you love to learn, if you are willing to share knowledge and would love to be part of a well-motivated and growing team, using the latest technology stack and having fun doing it, this is an opportunity you can't miss.

Position


Remote-first



What we offer


Ownership, defining your own career pathway
A unique growth opportunity, being one of the firsts on a fast-growing team that will make healthcare better and have a significant impact in people‚Äôs lives
Fantastic working environment, with a young and enthusiastic, and talented 30+ team coming from highly reputed players from Healthcare to Unicorn Startups, and leading Multinational
Financial benefits
Competitive salary
Private health insurance
Allowance for home-office equipment
Non-financial benefits
Equal opportunity and inclusive environment
Flexible work schedule
Flexible vacation policy
Corporate events (all-hands; retreats; ...)



What is the recruiting process like


There is a first interview with your future manager and/ or seasoned team members to get to know you and to give you an overview of Promptly and of the job you are applying to
Afterwards, you will undergo a technical assessment stage, in which you will work on a test task or solve a business case.‚ÄØ
In same exceptional cases, a third interview might take place. Don‚Äôt worry if this happens. It‚Äôs because we have a good opinion on you, but there might be something we still need to get clear
Finally, you will get your offer, and hopefully you‚Äôll accept it!
Also, we would like to notify you that during the final phases os the interview process, we may perform reference checks to validate the information provided in your application, resume, and discussed during the interview.



Our Culture & Values

Empathy

If there is 1 rule at Promptly, this is the one ‚Äì before making any judgement, put yourself in the shoes of another.

Empathy is the courage to choose to actively understand what the experience of another person could have felt like, without necessarily have experienced it ourselves.

Empathy is not a one-day journey, it is a mindset that must be continuously developed ‚Äì it is an everyday choice to fight for kindness and, by doing so, to help change people, organizations, and society for the better.

If you embrace this mindset, you are a true leader @ Promptly, you are a true leader in our society.

Ownership

At Promptly, we don‚Äôt foster fixed hierarchies or top-down decision-making. If you want to hit the ground running in our team, do not wait for someone to ‚Äútell you what to do‚Äù.

Acting like an owner means that you should align with our core purpose and find the best way to deliver on it, every day.

Starting a new project, analyzing new data, reaching out to a new client, there is no area of the company you cannot have an impact in, because there is no such thing as ‚Äúsomeone else‚Äôs problem‚Äù.

Responsibility

Working to improve healthcare is a great responsibility and what inspires us to not settle for less.

You have the responsibility to be a leader within our company. A leader is not a title. A leader is someone who delivers on our core purpose and inspires others to follow our cultural values. It is a ‚Äúgreat power, and a great responsibility‚Äù.

Leadership comes with the awareness of one‚Äôs own strengths and weaknesses and the responsibility to use these to deliver on what you promised. It comes with the responsibility to understand the context, ask for help when needed (teamwork), and be accountable for the quality of what we produce (excellence).

Teamwork

Our team is our greatest asset, and we are fortunate to attract great people. We go the extra mile to find the best person for every role ‚Äì making our team diverse in backgrounds, personal experiences, skills and knowledge.

If you are not contributing ‚Äì or worse, actively destroying ‚Äì teamwork, you are derailing us from our core purpose and ultimately hurting patient care.

Excellence

At Promptly, we‚Äôre recognized by society as thought leaders, contributing to research and evidence generation through technology and data science.

We put on ourselves a very high pressure to keep delivering on this role to our customers, patients and society.

Excelling at our work is a continuous process of improvement, it is not an end state. We're committed to continuous learning and self-development. So, if you have just finalized delivering a great work, rest, enjoy and go improve your work further.

Our Culture & Values

Empathy

If there is 1 rule at Promptly, this is the one ‚Äì before making any judgement, put yourself in the shoes of another.

Empathy is the courage to choose to actively understand what the experience of another person could have felt like, without necessarily have experienced it ourselves.

Empathy is not a one-day journey, it is a mindset that must be continuously developed ‚Äì it is an everyday choice to fight for kindness and, by doing so, to help change people, organizations, and society for the better.

If you embrace this mindset, you are a true leader @ Promptly, you are a true leader in our society.

Ownership

At Promptly, we don‚Äôt foster fixed hierarchies or top-down decision-making. If you want to hit the ground running in our team, do not wait for someone to ‚Äútell you what to do‚Äù.

Acting like an owner means that you should align with our core purpose and find the best way to deliver on it, every day.

Starting a new project, analyzing new data, reaching out to a new client, there is no area of the company you cannot have an impact in, because there is no such thing as ‚Äúsomeone else‚Äôs problem‚Äù.

Responsibility

Working to improve healthcare is a great responsibility and what inspires us to not settle for less.

You have the responsibility to be a leader within our company. A leader is not a title. A leader is someone who delivers on our core purpose and inspires others to follow our cultural values. It is a ‚Äúgreat power, and a great responsibility‚Äù.

Leadership comes with the awareness of one‚Äôs own strengths and weaknesses and the responsibility to use these to deliver on what you promised. It comes with the responsibility to understand the context, ask for help when needed (teamwork), and be accountable for the quality of what we produce (excellence).

Teamwork

Our team is our greatest asset, and we are fortunate to attract great people. We go the extra mile to find the best person for every role ‚Äì making our team diverse in backgrounds, personal experiences, skills and knowledge.

If you are not contributing ‚Äì or worse, actively destroying ‚Äì teamwork, you are derailing us from our core purpose and ultimately hurting patient care.

Excellence

At Promptly, we‚Äôre recognized by society as thought leaders, contributing to research and evidence generation through technology and data science.

We put on ourselves a very high pressure to keep delivering on this role to our customers, patients and society.

Excelling at our work is a continuous process of improvement, it is not an end state. We're committed to continuous learning and self-development. So, if you have just finalized delivering a great work, rest, enjoy and go improve your work further.

Title: Full Stack Mobile (Lisbon)
Description:
Reaktor's award-winning tech community is looking for Mobile Developers with Versatile Experience to join us in Lisbon.

If you are passionate about creating world-class mobile experiences but are equally eager to contribute across backend, frontend, and infrastructure projects, this role might just be for you. We‚Äôre looking for developers who excel in mobile development and are eager to apply their skills across other areas when needed.

As a Mobile Developer at Reaktor, you will focus on delivering exceptional mobile solutions while contributing to other parts of the tech stack as the project demands. Your role spans the entire software development lifecycle, from front-end to production, with a primary focus on mobile development. Whether it‚Äôs brainstorming with the client, building backend services, or enhancing CI/CD pipelines, you‚Äôll have the opportunity to apply your expertise, broaden your skillset, and make a meaningful impact.

Your Daily Tasks Include


Collaborating with the client‚Äôs tech and business teams to understand their needs and help them pick the right technologies for their goals.
Designing and implementing new features, which may require updates to frontend applications, backend servers, databases, or even infrastructure.
Delivering world-class technical expertise to both the client and your team.
Debugging, designing, and participating in architectural decisions to create robust and scalable solutions.
Working across the software development lifecycle, from front-end to production, while focusing on delivering exceptional mobile solutions.
Broadening your skillset by contributing to backend services, frontend applications, or CI/CD pipelines as needed.


You are a curious-minded developer who is comfortable working across the stack, combining mobile development expertise with an understanding of backend, frontend, and infrastructure to tackle challenges holistically.

To Thrive In This Position, You‚Äôll Need


Mobile Mastery: Strong experience in at least one mobile ecosystem (iOS/Android) with openness to exploring cross-platform solutions.
Complementary Tech Skills: Familiarity with other areas of development, such as backend (e.g., Node.js, Java, Kotlin, Python), frontend (e.g., React, TypeScript/JavaScript), or DevOps (e.g., CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure).
Versatility: Strong experience in mobile development, with additional familiarity in backend, frontend, ops, or consulting as a bonus.
Proven Experience: Several years of hands-on development experience. While we don‚Äôt have a hard limit, we find these competencies usually take time to develop.
Technical Proficiency:
Knowledge of at least one server-side language and framework (e.g., Node.js, Java, Scala, Python).
Experience with at least one common client-side framework (e.g., React, React Native, Swift, Java/Kotlin).
Familiarity with databases like PostgreSQL and foundational knowledge of DevOps, including CI, automated deployment, and test automation.
Collaboration Skills: A comfortable and proactive approach to engaging with clients, understanding their needs, and communicating solutions effectively.
Growth-Oriented Mindset: A curiosity to learn and adapt across new domains, while maintaining a strong foundation in mobile development.
Fluent English Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication to thrive in an international and collaborative environment.

Why join us?

For two decades, we‚Äôve been developing qualities and capabilities for adapting, reacting, and supporting change ‚Äì building Reaktor to hold up in a fast-paced environment while ensuring the well-being of our people.

While Working At Reaktor, We‚Äôll Provide You With


An inspiring Lisbon office culture. Be part of a small but strong community of 20+ talented professionals where you can make a real impact while staying closely connected to Reaktor‚Äôs global network.
The ability to impact how you work. Together with the client, your team chooses the approach, technologies, and methodologies you think will work best in any given situation
A community with as much support as your heart desires
A team that‚Äôs not only experienced but considerate as well ‚Äì they all want you to succeed
A sustainable work-life balance and support for your daily life outside of work. (e.g., free moving day, Reaktor car share, sick child care services, office space to use for your private events, etc.)
An opportunity to grow as a professional. In addition to the day-to-day work, we offer internal training courses, community events, and 15-minute coffee breaks to discuss hot topics in tech and design
A possibility to take part in more extended academy-like studies like Cloud Academy
300+ hobby clubs, from winter swimming and running to knitting and archery, that bring people together outside of (and sometimes inside) office hours. Many of these are supported by Reaktor
Check more benefits & perks below


Why Lisbon?

Reaktor‚Äôs Lisbon office is uniquely positioned to offer a small, close-knit environment while staying connected to the resources and expertise of a global organization. Lisbon offers the perfect balance of work and life, with its welcoming atmosphere, stunning coastline, and rich culture. Enjoy meaningful work, great colleagues, and moments like savoring past√©is de nata with your coffee or catching a sunset by the ocean. Join us in shaping the future of our growing team, creating meaningful work, and enjoying everything this vibrant city has to offer.

Diversity, equity, and inclusion

Together, we are committed to making Reaktor an environment that embraces and values all of our employees for the whole of who they are. We encourage applicants from all backgrounds to apply, knowing that studies show that members of underrepresented communities don‚Äôt apply for jobs unless they fully satisfy all of the requirements. If you're thinking twice about applying for this reason, we invite you to send us your application anyway. You could be just the person we're looking for.

Read more about our DEI work here.

Interested? Drop us a line ‚Äì We'll be happy to hear from you!

Title: Intermediate Fullstack Developer (i.e. React.js, Node.js, Python)
Description:
If you're passionate about technology and ready for a challenge, join our team of talented individuals and show your technical skills, creativity, and drive for impact.

You'll work with the best in the industry in a supportive, happy, and human-centric environment, making seamless technology. That‚Äôs why we were recognized as Best Workplace¬Æ in Europe (medium companies), Best Quality of Life Company¬Æ and the 2nd Best Great Place to Work¬Æ in Portugal by Great Place to Work¬Æ. See for yourself by checking our Glassdoor reviews.

What exciting projects will you have to make an impact and work on

At Imaginary Cloud, our work improves and simplifies people's lives by creating easy and intuitive digital products. Our day-to-day tasks include development, problem-solving, management, and human interaction.

Together, we will drive innovation by creating innovative projects for some of the best companies around the world. You'll be able to grow as you engage with multidisciplinary teams, multiple industries, and projects, overcoming the many challenges that will test and build your skills.

Here's an overview of the technical skills you'll likely have to embark on our team:


2+ years of working experience in Javascript Development (React.js, Angular.js, Node.js)
Academic background in Computer Science or similar field
A clear understanding of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
Outstanding proficiency in writing well-designed, testable, efficient code by using best software development practices
Experience with different open-source programming languages used on web projects
Fluency in English, both spoken and written
We seek team members who live in Portugal or are willing and legally qualified to live and work there


The salary range for this position is 28 374,95‚Ç¨ - 34 616,27‚Ç¨ gross per year

Get To Know Our Tech Stack


Javascript (React.js, Angular.js, Vue.js, Node.js)
Ruby / Ruby on Rails
Python / Django
Git
SQL (MySQL / PostgreSQL)
Mobile development (iOS, Android, React Native)
Linux / Mac OS - command line
Automated provisioning tools (Docker / Ansible / Capistrano)
NoSQL (Mongo, Redis, etc.)
Photoshop / Figma


We want you to feel comfortable here. Get the best of your potential with our benefits:


Salary according to your experience and performance
Paid sick days
Health and dental insurance
Comfort budget


What You Get


A remote-first company
Flexible working hours
Global projects with industry-leading clients
A human-centric culture that values people and empowers them
Informal environment
Team events to share knowledge and celebrate collectively
Mentoring and performance appraisals for solid growth potential


Does this sound exactly like what you‚Äôre looking for? Then apply now, and let's get the conversation started!

Title: Senior Observability Engineer
Description:
Our client is an international tech consulting company with +25 years of experience offering solutions to support companies' businesses and digital transformation.

Responsibilities


Design, implement, and manage observability solutions to monitor system and application performance.
Create dashboards, alerts, and reports for actionable insights.
Utilize tools like Datadog and OpenTelemetry to develop observability platforms.
Troubleshoot and resolve monitoring and observability issues.
Maintain infrastructure as code (Terraform) across multi-cloud environments.
Document observability solutions, including best practices and standards.
Collaborate with development and operations teams to integrate observability into CI/CD pipelines.
Promote best practices and ensure consistent adoption across teams.
Evaluate and implement new observability tools to enhance monitoring and alerting.
Mentor junior engineers on observability tools and practices.


Requirements


Education: Bachelor's or Masters in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience).
Experience: 4+ years in observability, focusing on cloud technologies and automation.
Technical Skills:
Design and implementation of observability solutions using open standards.
Proficiency in Datadog and OpenTelemetry.
Container orchestration (Kubernetes).
Infrastructure as code (Terraform).
Cloud platforms: Azure and GCP.
Software development background (preferred).
Other monitoring/observability tools and additional cloud services.
Familiarity with DevOps tools and security best practices in observability.
Soft Skills:
Strong problem-solving, communication, and collaboration skills.
Adaptability to new technologies and methodologies.
Show more

Title: Backend Software Engineer
HTML:
Welcome to 1GLOBAL, a dynamic and innovative force in the intersection of telecommunications and technology. Founded by two visionary technology entrepreneurs, Hakan Ko√ß and Pyrros Koussios, 1GLOBAL is a privately owned company with a clear mission to connect the world, seamlessly. With over 100 million dollars in revenue and being both profitable and cash generative, 1GLOBAL has the ability to fund its massive growth without relying on external funding.

 

As a global specialty telecommunications provider, 1GLOBAL serves financial institutions, enterprises, mobile network operators, and consumers across 42 countries, offering fully regulated voice, data, and SMS services. As pioneers in the eSIM revolution, we've built a complete ecosystem that drives our growth with partners such as Apple, Palo Alto Networks and Google, while attracting customers like Goldman Sachs, JP Morgan, Revolut, Netflix and Tesla.

 
The successfully hired candidate will receive onboarding and training in Lisbon, Portugal; gaining valuable skills while experiencing one of Europe's most dynamic and renowned cities.

Join us at 1GLOBAL and be part of that journey of massive growth, while forming the future of the global communication industry!

Position Overview

You will be part of a young development team accountable for the Network subscriber and service activation APIs product delivery and in-life management. The Network APIs systems and services are used to create, control and monitor correct subscriber network configuration, according to 1GLOBAL's multiple business use cases, spanning Consumer, Business, IoT and Wholesale product segments, down to the individual subscriber level, enabling connectivity for everyone and everything. It will integrate with 1GLOBAL's subscriber database repositories in the Core Network, as well as with CRM and Billing APIs and systems.

We run a multi site platform, following strict security requirements, provide the service to customers around the word and manage millions of subscriber profiles. We embrace a highly collaborative and diverse environment, value teamwork, autonomy and held accountability for our deliverables and customer success.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Implementation and development of 1GLOBAL Network subscriber and service activation APIs;
  • Implement an architecture that is resilient, scalable, secure and fault tolerant;
  • Implement the necessary procedures and metrics on his contributions for an effective monitoring on the platform;
  • Assist the roadmap management with quality estimates promoting an effective management of expectations;
  • Accountable for the outcomes of his work, and for the effectively working end to end flows;
  • Strong contributor to roadmap implementation allowing a continuing and fast evolution of the solution. Be able to deliver small incremental features often;
  • Collaborate with other team members and contribute to a common code repository;
  • Promote seamless integration of the new features into the existing codebase;
  • Promote code quality, readability and high test coverage;
  • Promote overall quality of the solution and ensure high performance;
  • Document solutions and flows;


Requirements

  • 4+ years of experience in the development of Java applications;
  • Proven experience with relational databases (at least PostgreSQL);
  • Proficient with REST APIs, both in implementing the interfaces and consuming;
  • Knowledgeable of high standards and patterns for software implementation;
  • Familiar with collaborative development tools and processes;
  • Previous experience with DevOps practices;
  • Familiar with CI/CD flows, Git, Docker;
  • Good understanding of cloud services (e.g. AWS, GCP, Oracle Cloud, Azure) and scalable infrastructure;
  • Proficiency in the English language, both written and verbal, sufficient for success in a remote and largely asynchronous work environment;


Benefits

Why 1GLOBAL?

  • Growth Opportunities: Advance your career in one of the fastest growing telecommunications companies, expanding over 40% year-on-year under the leadership of successful tech entrepreneurs
  • Major Transaction Exposure: Be in the driver's seat for transactions that will have an impact on the future telco industry
  • Work with a Talented Team: From the Board and the Founders to the Senior Management Team, you will collaborate daily with the most capable and renowned external advisors, and constantly being exposed to talented and driven individuals
  • Dynamic Work Environment: Thrive in a collaborative, fast-paced workplace where innovation is encouraged, and every contribution counts
  • Professional Development: Work alongside industry experts to enhance your skills and knowledge in a cutting-edge field
  • International Experience: Gain opportunities to work in different 1GLOBAL offices around the world as you grow within the company
  • Open Communication Culture: Join a team where your ideas are heard, and open dialogue is encouraged, fostering a supportive and transparent work environment
  • Get Things Done Attitude: Be part of a results-driven team that values efficiency, creativity, and the drive to make a tangible impact in the industry

 

1GLOBAL is an equal opportunity employer, we value your character as much as your talent. Diversity drives our innovation and we offer a collaborative, dynamic, and international work environment. We are excited for you to join our mission to revolutionise connectivity globally.

Title: Junior Market Researcher (Crypto and Blockchain)
Description:
Seedify.Fund is a leading cryptocurrency launchpad platform dedicated to fostering innovation

and success in the Web3 space. Our mission is to identify and assist promising teams and projects and offer outstanding returns to our investor base. The Market Research Department aims to observe, understand, analyze and interpret market dynamics in order to drive effective project incubations and successful token launches. As part of our growth, we are seeking a passionate Junior Market Research Analyst to join our team and work directly under the guidance of the Lead Market Researcher.

Role :

As a Junior Market Research Analyst, you will play a vital role in critically analyzing

research, identifying emerging narratives within the blockchain and crypto ecosystem, and contributing to the development of mid- and long-term actionable insights. This position is ideal for someone eager to grow their expertise in cryptocurrency market trends, blockchain technology, and Web3 innovations.

Key Responsibilities:

Analyze research reports, whitepapers, and market data to extract meaningful insights.

Identify emerging trends, narratives, and patterns in the blockchain and cryptocurrency markets.

Collaborate in the creation of mid- and long-term strategies that guide project incubations and token launch plans.

Assist in tracking and maintaining a knowledge repository of industry reports revolving around both the broader market and particular nascent verticals.

Present findings and insights through well-structured reports and visual presentations.

Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) of active and upcoming projects within the ecosystem.

Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in Finance, Economics, Mathematics or related fields.

Minimum of 2 years of active participation in early-stage investment strategies is acceptable in lieu of relevant formal education.

Strong understanding of blockchain technology, cryptocurrencies, and tokenomics. In particular, strong understanding of fundamental DeFi aspects (Staking, Bonding, v2 and v3 LPs) and their potential implications.

Required Skills:

Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex data and identify key insights.

Familiarity with research tools and platforms like Messari, Glassnode, and Dune Analytics.

Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.

A proactive attitude and eagerness to contribute to a dynamic team environment.

Experience in market research, data analysis, or strategy formulation.

Knowledge of DeFi protocols, NFT ecosystems, or layer-2 scaling solutions.

Previous experience working in the Web3 space or a related industry.

What We Offer:

Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.

A collaborative and innovative work environment.

Opportunities for professional development and growth.

Access to cutting-edge research and tools in the blockchain industry.

Flexible working hours and remote work options.
Show more

Title: Data Engineer Python (Senior) ID27950
HTML:
AgileEngine is one of the Inc. 5000 fastest-growing companies in the U and a top-3 ranked dev shop according to Clutch. We create award-winning custom software solutions that help companies across 15+ industries change the lives of millions

If you like a challenging environment where you‚Äôre working with the best and are encouraged to learn and experiment every day, there‚Äôs no better place - guaranteed! :)

What you will do

  • Build data pipelines using NiFi (ETL flows) to connect different sources of data together;
  • Build data reports and optimize SQL queries;
  • Produce high-quality code;
  • Identify performance bottlenecks;
  • Communicate with Engineering & Product management;
  • Align with existing development teams.

Must haves

  • 3+ years of experience in software development;
  • BS in Computer Science or equivalent practical experience;
  • Strong analytical SQL knowledge;
  • Practical experience building Data Warehouse(s) with Snowflake or other DW-oriented databases (Google BigQuery, Redshift, etc.);
  • Practical experience building ETL/ELT data pipelines from scratch or using existing tools like Apache NiFi;
  • Practical experience with Python;
  • Amazon RDS experience;
  • Working knowledge of Docker;
  • Upper-intermediate English level.

The benefits of joining us

  • Professional growth

Accelerate your professional journey with mentorship, TechTalks, and personalized growth roadmaps.

  • Competitive compensation

We match your ever-growing skills, talent, and contributions with competitive USD-based compensation and budgets for education, fitness, and team activities.

  • A selection of exciting projects

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
Mutual Respect, Empathy, Innovation, and Professional Pride. Do you see yourself within these values?




Founded in 2006 with the mission "To Challenge Complexity", Closer Consulting is a Data Science company specializing in Business Intelligence, Advanced Analytics, and Artificial Intelligence.

Developing projects in the most diverse industries ‚Äì Banking, Telecommunications, Healthcare, Retail, Energy, Insurance, and Aviation, among others ‚Äì, we have created an environment where the brightest enquiring minds feel at home, providing our people with the means, opportunities and support they need to thrive and innovate.




We seek a Senior Data Scientist (5+ years of experience) willing to accept new challenges in our Closer team in a hybrid work model in Lisbon.




Are you the one?

Minimum 5 years of of hands-on experience as a data scientist or in a similar role, preferably in a multinational, fast-paced environment
Data Visualization tools - Qlik Sense / Qlik View / PowerBI / Tableau
Strong understanding of design principles and ability to translate requirements into technical specifications
Experience leading and mentoring data science teams
Programming languages such as Python, R, or Scala, and experience working with big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark, Kafka)
Strong self management and problem-solving skills
Knowledge of data management (ETL) and Snowflake is preferred
Practical experience with agile methodologies
Fluency in English is mandatory




We believe we are the ones to, by:

Providing a multidisciplinary Team.
Giving a home office kit with everything you need to perform remotely.
Ensuring a career plan alongside professional growth.
Providing you with a custom training plan.
Helping you reach happiness.




Oh‚Ä¶ and by the way, we also have:

Several challenging complex projects.
Stimulating teams and leaders.
World-class Clients and Partners.




If you believe in this match as much as we do, send us your CV to catarina.rolo@closer.pt and reach the closer side of life.




Closer is a company that values diversity and inclusion. We are committed to fostering an environment where everyone is treated with dignity and respect, regardless of race, gender, beliefs, sexual orientation, physical or mental disability, or other personal characteristics.




At Closer, we embrace the unique perspectives and experiences that everyone brings, and we believe that it is a fundamental driver for the success we've achieved.

Title: Senior Data Scientist (Portugal)
Description:
We are a small consulting firm specializing in the retail and supply chain sectors. Our team leverages advanced data analytics to provide actionable insights for our clients. We are looking for a talented Data Scientist to join our dynamic team and contribute to our mission of delivering data-driven solutions by helping us discover the information hidden in large amounts of data and help extract valuable business insights for our clients. The candidate should have a strong background in statistics, keen sense of programming, machine learning and data visualization to effectively share the found insights in a clear manner.




Your primary focus will be on data cleansing, processing, applying data mining techniques, doing statistical analysis, building high quality prediction systems, identify questions, create new algorithms and drawing conclusions from the analysis.




In this role, you should be highly analytical with a knack for analysis, math and statistics.¬†We are looking for someone with an engaging communication style with confidence in interpreting numerical information, and a genuine curiosity and enthusiasm for understanding the markets/clients.




A self-starter with an inquisitive nature and would want to look beyond the obvious to explore why things are there. Critical and conceptual thinking and problem-solving skills are essential alongside passion for machine-learning and research.

¬†

About us

ebp Global is a rapidly growing, high-performing boutique consultancy firm best known for delivering world-class impactful solutions to our clients‚Äô most complex problem. Our expertise cover retail strategy, organisational design, supply chain and fulfilment, technology planning, analytics, digital transformation, as well as technology development.¬†

¬†

We offer an inspiring seamless working environment and dynamic career opportunities help you to develop both personally and professionally.




Responsibilities

Lead the development and implementation of advanced analytical models and machine learning algorithms.¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†
Oversee data analysis projects from start to finish, ensuring high-quality deliverables.
Partner with clients to identify business challenges and provide strategic insights.
Mentor and guide junior data scientists.
Utilize Python, SQL, and Azure to deliver challenging projects with a robust commercial approach including but not limited to
Processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis
Undertaking the pre-processing of structured and unstructured data
Selecting features, building, and optimizing models using machine learning techniques
Correlating disparate data
Data mining using state-of-the-art methods
Enhancing data collection procedures to include information that is relevant for building analytic systems
Analyse large amounts of information to discover trends and patterns
Deliver high quality actionable insights by performing ad hoc analysis to predict, measure and interpret business trends.
Ability to build/amend Python APIs and machine-learning algorithms to support and deliver solutions to the clients.
Clearly and concisely communicate data science insights that engage and influence both technical as well as non / less technical audiences.
Create highly visual insights to support storytelling and visualization for the clients




Skills and Qualifications

Master's degree or PhD in a quantitative field (e.g., Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Engineering) and minimum 5 years working in a Data Science environment
Demonstrable programming experience in Python for data science and machine learning¬†
Experience with Large Language Models (LLMs) and their applications in data science
Proficient in Python, SQL, NoSQL databases
Experience with version control like Git
Experience with common data science toolkits (NumPy, SciPy, Matplotlib, Pandas, IPython, TensorFlow, PyTorch etc.) and Scikit-Learn highly desirable
Extensive experience of data modelling and database design
A passion for developing and communicating deep and valuable insights
Extensive, demonstrable experience building and testing/validating machine learning models and using data mining techniques
Experience of working in a cloud computing environment, preferably Microsoft Azure
Experience using business intelligence tools (Tableau preferred)
Knowledge of data governance and privacy considerations and principles
Should be fluent in English (written & spoken)




Soft Skills

Analytical mind and business acumen
Strong maths skills (e.g. statistics, algebra, distributions, regression testing)
Problem-solving aptitude is essential
Strong leadership and project management skills.
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Ability to manage multiple projects and deliver results under tight deadlines.
Ability to learn and upgrade technical skills, in the fast-paced data analysis field
Ability to understand and visualize multidimensionality of business facts/measures
Ability to work in a dynamic, agile environment within a geographically distributed team




We are seeking high potential and driven individuals to join our team. Packages will be commensurate with outstanding applicant profiles.




Location: Based in Portugal, with hybrid office/work from home conditions.




Applicants must have the right to work in Portugal.

¬†

Please send full resume with current and expected salary as well as available date by e-mail to¬†info.eu@ebp-global.com.¬†Only relevant CVs will be contacted.

We are seeking high potential and driven individuals to join our team. Packages will be commensurate with outstanding applicant profiles.


Location: Based in Portugal, with hybrid office/work from home conditions.


Applicants must have the right to work in Portugal.

 

Please send full resume with current and expected salary as well as available date by e-mail to info.eu@ebp-global.com. Only relevant CVs will be contacted.

Title: Machine Learning Senior Officer
Description:
Job Description:




Would you like to work on interesting projects with renowned clients? At ALTEN we believe that knowing and meeting our consultants' expectations is a key factor in our success. Our consultants make a difference. Do you want to make a difference too?




We are looking for a Machine Learning Senior Officer to support projects for large companies present in Lisbon and Porto.




Tasks:

‚úìAnalyze internal clients‚Äô needs:

Collaborate with clients to best understand their operational and strategic needs in terms of complex AI/ML challenges > Investigate and solve business issues using technical, data-driven, AI/ML strategies.

‚úìBuild and/or adapt AI/ML models:

Design and develop Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions, i.e., collect labeled data, setup and train models, test and evaluate results > Work closely with clients during application roll-out and all stages of the application lifecycle > Design the most adequate approaches to solve the identified problems within the company‚Äôs framework.

‚úìImplement and assist the deployment and maintenance of models:

Follow to best practices in the industry to implement and scale out the developed solutions into production grade software > Assist the operational teams with the deployment, monitoring and maintenance of the developed solutions




Skills:




‚úì Fluent in English (C1- C2)

‚úì Ability to think abstractly and creatively

‚úì Ability to explain the results of a model and the different elements impacting it

‚úì High statistical and quantitative analysis skills (e.g. machine learning models, statistical models, Bayesian statistics, probability theory, time series analysis, ‚Ä¶)

‚úì Knowledge of ETL methods

‚úì Knowledge of Machine Learning models

‚úì Knowledge of NLP and/or computer vision techniques

‚úì Knowledge of deep learning architectures and frameworks (e.g. TensorFlow, Keras, ‚Ä¶)

‚úì Knowledge of at least one ML development stack (e.g. Scikit-learn, Keras, PyTorch‚Ä¶)

‚úì Effective Programming skills (e.g. Python) and algorithmic knowledge ‚úì Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

‚úì Flexibility: ability to work in a changing environment

‚úì Research-oriented.




Experience:




‚úì Up to 2 year experience as Data Analyst / Data Scientist / Machine Learning Specialist in at least one of the following areas:

> NLP, data extraction, document processing or process automation projects;

> Classification / Regression / Clustering Machine Learning and/or statistical models;

> Deep Learning models preferentially in the context of NLP, Speech-to-text or computer vision projects;

> Artificial Intelligence techniques and paradigms;

> Exposure to professional software development environment.




Location: Lisbon and Porto, Portugal.




What We Offer:

Contract with competitive salary.

Opportunity to work in a collaborative and innovative environment.




How to Apply:

If you meet the qualifications and are excited about this opportunity, please send your resume to amanda.deamorim@alten.es




We want to hear from you!

Title: Python Developer
Description:
Decskill, founded in 2014 as an IT Consulting Company, places paramount importance on its greatest asset: its people. Our main mission is to deliver value through knowledge and talent, and we achieve this by fostering a culture of excellence and investing in the development and well-being of our people. With over 600 dedicated professionals and offices in Lisbon, Porto, Madrid, and Luxembourg, Decskill operates across three core areas:




DECSKILL TALENT: We believe that our people are key to our success. Through Decskill Talent, we empower our team to embrace the digital transformation challenges of our clients. We collaborate with clients to drive innovation, ensuring project success and business growth.




DECSKILL BOOST: Equipping our team with the latest tools and methodologies, we optimize Time-to-Market and deliver innovative solutions exceeding client expectations.




DECSKILL CONNECT: Our team collaborates closely with clients to implement and manage IT infrastructures that generate long-term value.




At Decskill, we believe that by nurturing and empowering our people to confront the challenges of digital transformation, we create value not only for our clients but also for our entire ecosystem, fostering a digital community dedicated to growth and progress.




We are looking for a Python Developer!




Requirements:

Educational background as Sofware Engineer or similar
5+ Years of work experience with Python Backend Development
Experience with developing web API frameworks (FastAPI or Flask)
Knowledgeable on writing unit tests (Pytest)
Experience working with graph databases such as Neo4J or similar technologies.
Knowledge working with Kubernetes.
Good experience of working with CI/CD pipelines with Gitlab for automated deployments
Familiar or experience with agile development methodology
Good communication and analytical skills, strong verbal and written communication skills in English are mandatory




If you‚Äôre interested in this job please send your CV in english to vanessa.romao@decskill.com with reference ‚ÄúVR/Python)‚Äù




Decskill is committed to equality and non-discrimination with all our talents. We recruit and promote talent, based on diversity and inclusion, regardless of age, gender, ethnicity, race, nationality or any other form of discrimination incompatible with the dignity of the human being.

Nearshore.

Team Building activities;

  12. Good English level.

Title: Big Data and AI Engineer
Description:
Are you driven by Technology? üî¥




If so, it's at Red IT that you should embrace your next challenge! We took our first steps in Innovation and Technology in 2016, and the desire to do more and better is always with us.

Red.it stands as a key element within Group RIT, a collaboration of technological enterprises focused on accelerating business growth through digital transformation. Our teams are experienced and certified IT professionals that work closely with clients, to provide fit-for-purpose solutions. From software development, next-generation cloud services, support in IT projects across multiple technological stacks, IT outsourcing, and many more, Group RIT will use the most advanced technology to accelerate and unleash the full potential of our client's business. With 6 Business Units, 11 offices in 8 countries and a global team of over 500 people, Group RIT is leading digital innovation, providing innovative solutions for multiple business sectors like Telecom, Healthcare, Finance, Retail and Manufacturing.




Red.it is dedicated to fostering a workplace that embraces diversity and inclusion. As an equal opportunity employer, it does not discriminate based on race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, or any other legally protected status. We believe in creating an environment where all individuals are respected and valued for their unique perspectives and contributions.




Join the Wolfpack as a Big Data and AI Engineer (Hybrid - Lisbon)üê∫







What skills do you need to have?




Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Data Science, or a related field (preferred).
7+ years of experience in big data, advanced analytics, and AI, with a strong track record in project management.
Expertise in big data tools and platforms (AWS, Google Cloud, Hadoop, Spark) and machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow, Scikit-learn).
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights.
Excellent communication skills to engage both technical and non-technical stakeholders effectively.




Some of your responsibilities will be:




Lead and manage end-to-end big data and AI projects, ensuring alignment with business goals.
Develop and optimize machine learning models and data pipelines for scalable solutions.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate data insights into strategic business recommendations.
Ensure best practices in data governance, security, and compliance across all analytics initiatives.
Foster an inclusive and innovative work environment that encourages knowledge sharing and continuous learning.







RED CODE




A team focused on achieving objectives, motivation will not be lacking! Red Team!

Red Training - We want to help you reach your potential.

Continuous career support and advice. Red Follow Up

Red Change - You love what you do, but want to explore other areas? No problem Wolf!

There is time for everything, and fun is not left out. Red Hours

Red Spirit - If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, GO TOGETHER!




Keywords: Big Data, AI, Tensorflow, Spark, Hadoop, AWS, Google, Data Science




WHAT DRIVES YOU




Apply here or through join.us@redit.pt and find out what moves us at www.redit.pt

Title: Python Developer
Description:
@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, team work.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!




We are looking for an Amazing: Python Developer

Seniority: mid-level

Type of position: Hibrid

The amazing you, will have:




Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or similar;
+3 years of experience as Python developer;
Proficiency in Python and its libraries, frameworks, and tools;
Solid understanding of software development principles, design patterns, and best practices;
Experience with Django or Flask is a plus;
Experience with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is a plus.
Familiarity with database systems, including SQL and NoSQL databases.
Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
Fluent in English (mandatory)
Must be in Lisbon (mandatory)










Why should you become part of our family?

You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term
Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity
Free training programs: Our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster
International projects in Benelux: you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work
Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that¬¥s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days‚Ä¶ all remote!







Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto, Leiria and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the ‚ÄúIndex of Excellence‚Äù, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

HTML:
@ KCS IT, we look for the ones that stands out, for those that always wants to be better and fight for it, and for those who has the same values that we do: dedication, energy, integrity, transparency, flexibility, trust, honesty, hard work, proactivity, team work.

At KCS we stand for equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for everyone! We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability or any factor other than merit. All applications with skills for the position are welcome!


We are looking for an Amazing: Python Developer

Seniority: mid-level

Type of position: Hibrid

The amazing you, will have:


  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or similar;
  • +3 years of experience as Python developer;
  • Proficiency in Python and its libraries, frameworks, and tools;
  • Solid understanding of software development principles, design patterns, and best practices;
  • Experience with Django or Flask is a plus;
  • Experience with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is a plus.
  • Familiarity with database systems, including SQL and NoSQL databases.
  • Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
  • Fluent in English (mandatory)
  • Must be in Lisbon (mandatory)




Why should you become part of our family?

  • You can develop a career that fits you: your career development is personalized, taking in consideration your needs and goals from a short to long term
  • Interesting Challenges Ahead: you can work for several clients from different sectors of activity
  • Free training programs: Our training and certification programs in languages, tech, behavior and business will help you to reach your full potential faster
  • International projects in Benelux: you can gain international experience in Benelux and balance a new way of living with work
  • Type of projects (depending on the project you might find one of this types of projects):
  • In hybrid Systems: Is important to balance work with socialization, that¬¥s why a hybrid system works for us and for you
  • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
  • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days‚Ä¶ all remote!



Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto, Leiria and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the ‚ÄúIndex of Excellence‚Äù, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

Title: Python Developer
HTML:

We are looking for an Amazing: Python developer

Seniority: Senior

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field;
  • +8 years of experience as Python developer;
  • Experience in Django and Flask frameworks;

Title: Machine Learning Engineer 672
Description:
The global data privacy software market is projected to grow from $2.36 billion in 2022 to $25.85 billion by 2029.

So, if you are searching for an innovative career, then the cybersecurity industry might just be the one for you. Protegrity, an international provider of data protection solutions, is looking for new team members who want to make an impact in a company that prioritizes something we all care about: our privacy.

We need people who recognize the opportunity, can plan effectively, take action and execute in the enterprise marketplace with our intuitive, diverse, and future-forward global teams.

So, are you up for collaborating with the best in data security?

Join us on this journey and make an impact with one of the top 25 global software providers. We look forward to making our world become a better place with you on our team.

Apply and discover what‚Äôs next today!

Join Our Team as a Machine Learning Engineer at Protegrity!

Are you passionate about data security and privacy? Protegrity is looking for a talented Machine Learning Engineer to join our dynamic team. You'll work alongside software engineers and machine learning practitioners to design, build, and maintain applications that ensure data security and privacy.

Responsibilities


Collaborate with software and machine learning engineers to understand project requirements and design test plans that align with project goals.
Implement and maintain automated test suites for APIs, data pipelines, and other systems.
Integrate tests into CI/CD pipelines to ensure quality during continuous development cycles.
Work closely with developers to reproduce bugs and verify fixes.
Identify and document issues in JIRA.
Collaborate with DevOps to ensure robust deployments, ensuring proper logging/monitoring of systems in production.


Qualifications


5-7 years of industry experience.
Deep learning frameworks (preferably Keras and Pytorch) and machine learning algorithms and respective frameworks.
NLP experience.
Familiarity with cloud platforms with a focus on AWS is preferred.
Common data manipulation frameworks (Pandas, NumPy, etc.).
Design and conduct experiments to further improve the performance of machine learning systems.
Strong programming skills with fluency in Python.
Working knowledge of CI/CD best practices.


Working Model


This role is available as a hybrid role. You will work out of your home and generally would require you to attend on-site meetings based on business needs. In certain circumstances, the work model may change to accommodate business needs.


Why Protegrity


This role offers the opportunity to innovate at the intersection of GenAI safety, privacy, and governance. You will play a pivotal role in helping customers establish trust and compliance in their AI applications while contributing to the company‚Äôs technical strategy and industry leadership. Join us in shaping the future of GenAI security.
We offer a highly competitive compensation and benefits package as well as the excitement, challenges, and rewards of a fast-growing, entrepreneurial company.
Become a member of a leading Data and GenAI Protection, Privacy and Security company during one of the best market opportunities to come along in a generation.
Competitive Compensation/Total Reward Packages
Paid Time Off (PTO)
Work on global projects with diverse, energetic, team members who respect each other and celebrate differences.


We offer a competitive salary and comprehensive benefits with generous vacation and holiday time off. All employees are also provided access to ongoing learning & development.

Ensuring a diverse and inclusive workplace is our priority. We are committed to an environment of acceptance where you are free to bring your full self to work. All qualified applicants and current employees will not be discriminated against on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, national origin, disability or veteran status.

Please reference Section 12: Supplemental Notice for Job Applicants in our Privacy Policy to inform you of the categories of personal information that we collect from individuals who inquire about and/or apply to work for Protegrity USA, Inc., or its parent company, subsidiaries or affiliates, and the purposes for which we use such personal information.

Title: Python Developer
HTML:
NBCC CONSULTING is a fully customer-oriented information technology company whose mission since it was founded in 2010 has been to provide consultancy, development, implementation and maintenance services for information systems that contribute to the progress of society and the objectives of our customers. Our culture, motivation and spirit of mission, combined with competence and talent, have enabled us to successfully meet all the challenges we have set ourselves over the years.


CHALLENGE:

  • To join our IT consultancy team, which is growing rapidly on a daily basis;
  • To join a multidisciplinary team;
  • Analyze business needs and propose technical solutions to answer the need;
  • In case of issues: investigate, propose workaround (if possible) and implement /test corrections;
  • Participate to operational committee with GRM team members;
  • Develop, test, deploy and document the implemented solutions, in respect with AGO guidelines;
  • Ensure maintenance of application already lives;
  • Collaborate with architecture and security teams for new implementation definition;
  • Support users.


REQUIREMENTS:

  • Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or related field;
  • Minimum 7-8 years of professional experience;
  • Experience in Python;
  • Experience with large volume / optimization;
  • Good experience in using APIs
  • Experience with Microsoft Azure cloud and good knowledge of cloud frameworks.


CONDITIONS:

  • Integration into a company that has been growing strongly for several years;
  • Unlimited employment contract;
  • Salary package compatible with the position and the experience demonstrated;
  • Health insurance;
  • Ongoing training;
  • Professional development.

Title: New Graduates - Digital Assurance & Technology (Software Developer) | Lisboa e Porto
HTML:
At EY, you‚Äôll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we‚Äôre counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.

The Opportunity

As a Software Developer, at Digital Assurance & Technology (DAT) team, you will help organizations in leverage software development and technology to achieve a competitive advantage.

Your Key Responsibilities

  • Be part of multiple consulting projects for different clients;
  • Software development;
  • Identifying and defining customer requirements; Developing technical solutions using development tools and methodology;
  • Developing software components, codes and programs to deliver technical solutions that support business requirements;
  • Assisting clients on their enterprise applications implementations;
  • Understand EY and its service lines and actively assess/present ways to serve clients.

Skills And Attributes For Success

  • Business mindset;
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills;
  • Ability to delivery multiple projects and to present information in a clear and concise manner; A strong work ethic;
  • Forward thinker and self-starter;
  • Creative, proactive, team player and able to work under pressure.

To Qualify For The Role, You Must Have

  • Bachelor or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Engineering, Software Engineering, Electrotechnical Engineering, Aerospace Engineering, Biomedical Engineering or other related field;
  • Programming skills in one or more of the languages (e.g. C#, Java, Python, .Net, SAS);
  • Skills in Databases (SQL and NoSQL databases)
  • Ability to think out of the box and create multidisciplinary solutions;
  • Full English Proficiency.

What We Look For

  • Highly motivated individuals with excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to prioritize shifting workloads in a rapidly changing industry. An effective communicator, you‚Äôll be a confident team player equipped with strong people management skills and a genuine passion to make things happen in a dynamic organization. If you‚Äôre ready to take on a wide range of responsibilities and are committed to seeking out new ways to make a difference, this role is for you.

What Working At EY Offers

  • We offer a competitive remuneration package where you‚Äôll be rewarded for your individual and team performance. Plus, we offer: support and coaching; opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career; the freedom and flexibility to handle your role.

About EY

As a global leader in assurance, tax, strategy and transactions and consulting services, we‚Äôre using the finance products, expertise and systems we‚Äôve developed to build a better working world. That starts with a culture that believes in giving you the training, opportunities and creative freedom to make things better. Whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime.

Join us in building a better working world.

Apply now!

Title: We are a diverse, collaborative, and high-performing team - and we're always on the lookout for more people to join us!
Description:
Description

Who is Defined.ai ? Well, from a technical point of view, we leverage the power of a global crowd to provide some of the world‚Äôs biggest companies with the high-quality data they need to power their artificial intelligence. We‚Äôre instrumental to the progression and development of artificial intelligence and we couldn‚Äôt be prouder or more inspired to be involved in an industry that is changing the world.

From a personal point of view, we‚Äôre a group of big thinkers, high achievers and creative problem solvers. We bond over our shared love of software engineering, data science, and strong coffee. We like online gaming, running marathons, and team drinks. We celebrate authenticity and diversity and we‚Äôre invested in what we do. Our mission? World domination, obviously!

What will you do?

Deliver working software frequently through early and continuous integration and deployment of minimum valuable increments.

Work with Natural Language Processing (NLP), Large Language Models (LLMs), Speech Recognition (ASR) and Synthesis (TTS) projects.

Search for existing models in the areas above, evaluate and (if needed) fine tune them. Serve the models by turning them into API and batch jobs.

Build solid relationships with Infrastructure and Operations teams, ensuring smooth deployment and continuous improvement of models via robust and scalable ML pipelines.

Design and implement AI workloads for structured and unstructured datasets seamlessly.

Effectively communicate architectures and the development progress to both technical and non-technical audiences.

Who are we looking for?

Do you have the drive to work in an innovative and ambitious environment?

We‚Äôre looking for someone with a determined and proactive mindset, inspired and passionate to help us achieve our goals. Our successful candidate is a strong critical thinker, reliable and transparent, with an ability to learn and communicate. We are looking for someone special to contribute to our unique culture.

Requirements

Our Machine Learning / AI Engineer should have:

BSc or MSc in Computer Science or a related field.

Proficient in Python and Linux environments.

Experience with Ray.io and KubeRay for distributed computing.

Skilled in developing and integrating REST APIs and WebSockets endpoints.

Strong MLflow / Azure ML Service skills for managing ML lifecycles, including experimentation/fine tuning, reproducibility, and deployment.

Knowledgeable in using Lang Chain and Large Language Models (LLMs).

Experience with Piper TTS and Whisper for text-to-speech and speech recognition applications.

Familiar with ML Ops, including CI/CD for data pipelines and deploying AI models.

Ability to balance running AI workloads in cloud vs. private cloud environments for efficient GPU consumption.

Excellent storytelling abilities and the capability to explain complex concepts in simple terms.

Proficient in both written and spoken English.

Benefits

You spend a lot of your time at work, so it should be challenging, fun and interesting. At Defined.ai it will be all of those things and more. Here‚Äôs what we offer:

Flexible working schedule and hybrid model. We know comfort can boost creativity and performance, so you can manage your schedule and work both from one of our modern office spaces or home.

Excellent career development opportunities in a high growth company. With us, you can accomplish your career goals and follow a well-described career path with the support of your supervisor.

Culture of feedback and continuous improvement. AI is a fast-paced area, so we keep track of tech trends, and we always ask for feedback.

An international and diverse team. We have more than 30 nationalities at our 3 locations, and we provide language classes.

Continuous training opportunities. You can choose from many options: leveraging hand-on workshops, unlimited access to Udemy and formal development opportunities.

We love to have fun together. We joke a lot, and we can't imagine work without fun activities ‚Äì we already surfed, raced carts and played soccer together.

About Us

Defined.ai offers a platform with multiple data delivery options that leverages machine learning technology and human intelligence to deliver quality-guaranteed training data for AI systems. The platform offers self-service and fully customizable solutions that deliver high-quality project-specific training data, enabling AI products reach market quicker. It is this business model that has allowed Defined.ai to raise a total of $63.6M in funding over 4 rounds. Our value proposition is quality, privacy, speed and scale, covering more than 50 different languages. With strong expertise in speech and natural language processing technologies, we have been serving AI companies and Fortune 500 companies since day one. Defined.ai was founded in Seattle and has an office in Lisbon.

Privacy Notice

https://defined.ai/dataset/privacy-notice-career
