Title: Full-Stack Engineer - AI
Description:
Acolad is the global leader in content and language solutions. Its mission is to support companies in every industry to scale across markets and enable growth through cutting-edge technology and localization expertise. Established in 1993, the group is present in 23 countries across Europe, North America, and Asia, with over 1.800 employees supported by a network of +20.000 linguists around the world.

At Acolad, every position is key to our global growth: we know that we will only succeed if our people succeed.

Joining Acolad means a unique opportunity for professional development through a collaborative global environment that promotes talent and creativity. We are continuously looking for new talent (like you!) to support our mission to drive growth and innovation across some of the world's leading brands.

We are revolutionizing the localization industry with enterprise-grade SaaS solutions that enable businesses to deliver local content anywhere efficiently. Our mission is to harness cutting-edge AI technology to create innovative, user-centric products that redefine how content localization is managed and delivered.

Check out Our brand video to learn more about us!

We are revolutionizing the localization industry with enterprise-grade SaaS solutions that enable businesses to deliver local content anywhere efficiently. Our mission is to harness cutting-edge AI technology to create innovative, user-centric products that redefine how content localization is managed and delivered.

Role Overview

As a Full-Stack Software Engineer AI, you will play a pivotal role in transforming AI research and models into scalable, production-ready products that empower our users. Collaborating with a multidisciplinary team of AI Engineers, Software Engineers, and Data Scientists, you will own the end-to-end process of integrating AI solutions into our platform, exposing them through robust services and intuitive user interfaces.

Key Responsibilities


Product Development: Design, build, and deploy AI-powered SaaS products that align with user needs and business objectives
Full-Stack Engineering: Develop and maintain scalable backend systems using primarily Python and create engaging user interfaces with ReactJS
AI Integration: Work closely with AI engineers and data scientists to integrate machine learning models into our services in Production
Platform Operations: Leverage our tech stack, including Kubernetes (K8s) and BentoML, to ensure efficient deployment and management of AI applications
Collaboration: Participate in cross-functional discussions to identify and solve technical challenges, ensuring seamless product delivery
Scalability and Performance: Optimize the platform for performance, scalability, and high availability in an enterprise-grade environment



Requirements


Strong expertise in Python and ReactJS for backend and frontend development
Proven experience in developing and deploying full-stack applications
Familiarity with containerization and orchestration tools such as Kubernetes (K8s)
Experience with model-serving frameworks
Understanding of software development best practices, including CI/CD pipelines, testing, and version control (Git)
Proficiency in other programming languages (e.g., Go, Java, or TypeScript)
Experience in SaaS applications
Exposure to cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Knowledge of microservices architecture and API design



Benefits


Working time / schedule: 40hours/week - flexible schedule
Vacation entitlement: 22 days + Birthday Leave + More days according to seniority
Private health insurance (employee only)
Daily meal allowance


If you want to join us at the office, our location is in Miraflores, Lisbon and we offer:


Transportation allowance
Daily breakfast at the office
Show more

  • Understanding of software development best practices, including CI/CD pipelines, testing, and version control (Git)
  • Proficiency in other programming languages (e.g., Go, Java, or TypeScript)
  • Experience in SaaS applications
  • Exposure to cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
  • Knowledge of microservices architecture and API design


Benefits

  • Working time / schedule: 40hours/week - flexible schedule
  • Vacation entitlement: 22 days + Birthday Leave + More days according to seniority
  • Private health insurance (employee only)
  • Daily meal allowance

If you want to join us at the office, our location is in Miraflores, Lisbon and we offer:

  • Transportation allowance
  • Daily breakfast at the office

Title: Application Developer
Description:
We're fast learners, hard workers, natural collaborators... and we Make Modern Happen!




Our ambition is to unlock the potential of our digital world so that organisations everywhere can innovate and thrive securely.




We aim to achieve this goal by bringing together the world‚Äôs most talented people and the most powerful technologies, combining them to address our customers' challenges and to build something stronger together.




If you share our vision, join us!




Right now, we are looking for a Application Developer to integrate our internal team, based in Lisbon.




Your responsibilities include:

Develop and implement customized workflows, content pages, lists, libraries, and other SharePoint features to optimize processes.
Integrate SharePoint with other systems and tools, such as business applications.
Manage and maintain the SharePoint infrastructure, including permissions, backups, and updates.
Troubleshoot technical issues and provide user support.
Monitor system performance and identify areas for improvement.
Define and enforce policies and standards for SharePoint usage.
Promote the adoption and effective use of SharePoint tools across the organization.
Provide user training and ongoing support.




You must have:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Experience with the following technologies: .NET Framework, ASP.Net, C#, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, SQL Server
Experience with Microsoft SharePoint (on-premises required, knowledge of online SharePoint is a plus)




We value:




SharePoint certifications
.NET certifications
A proactive approach to learning and adapting to new technologies.
Strong analytical thinking.
Ability to design scalable solutions.
Teamwork and a collaborative mindset.
High sense of responsibility.
Fluency in English.







We offer:

Regular professional development;
Health insurance, with family package;
Regular teambuilding programs;
Friendly workplace.







Workplace: Lisbon -Hybrid




Make modern happen!

Title: AI Engineer Medior ‚Äì Senior
Description:
Esta √© uma posi√ß√£o remota.

We are seeking a talented AI Systems Engineer to join our dynamic team and contribute to the development and deployment of advanced AI solutions.

Must have


Setup of AI systems infrastructure in Azure cloud.
Experience with data pre-processing and feature engineering based on business and model requirements. Particularly for GenAI processes.
MLOps practices. Prepare CI/CD pipelines for building, testing, and deploying code.
Evaluate, deploy, and monitor AI models, including GPT-based systems.
Development of knowledge assistants in Microsoft Copilot Studio.
Experience with natural language understanding (NLP), computer vision, and deep learning.
Experience with Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), vector-based search, among others.
Experience with Large Language Model (LLM) agents, for example the ReAct methodology.


Business oriented


Transforming advanced AI concepts into tangible business solutions.
Design, develop, and provide guidance on setting up data architectures and data management frameworks for AI systems.
Evaluation of data and infrastructure requirements for AI systems.
Design AI systems and respective functional architectures.


Requisitos


Data management or pipelines skills, for example working with Data Factory, Fabric, among others.
Experience with the deployment of Azure resources via Bicep files.
Experience with deploying containerized applications with REST interfaces (FastAPI) via DevOps pipelines.
Frontend development experience.


Technology stack


Cloud services: Azure
Power platform: Copilot Studio
Version control: Git, Azure DevOps
Programming language: Python
Generative AI: OpenAI, Azure OpenAI (GPT, Embeddings)
Others: Azure Custom Vision, Bing Search, Azure Functions, Azure Cognitive Search, Copilot Studio, Streamlit, LangChain, CosmosDB, Document Intelligence, FastAPI, Shell, Bicep, Docker, Private Endpoints, Langfuse


Vantagens

Remote work

Food ticket

Health insurance

Training and access to certification vouchers

Work-life balance initiatives

Referral program

Birthday off

Give back day ‚Äì enjoy a day to give back to society!

Title: Banking Sector | Python Developer (Hybrid)
HTML:
Company Description

At Devoteam, we believe that technology with strong human values can actively drive change for the better. Discover how Tech for People unlocks the future, creating a positive impact on the people and the world around us. We are a global leading player in Digital Transformation for leading organisations across EMEA, with a revenue of ‚Ç¨1B. We believe in transforming technology to create value for our clients, partners and employees in a world where technology is developed for people. We are proud of the culture we have built together. We are proud of our people at the service of technology. We are proud of our diverse environment. Because we are #TechforPeople. Join our multidisciplinary team of Cloud experts, Designers, Business consultants, Security experts, Engineers, Developers and other extraordinary talents, spread across more than 20 EMEA countries. Become one of our +10.000 tech and business leaders on cloud, data and cyber security. Let‚Äôs fuse creativity with technology together and build innovative solutions that actively change things for the better.


Job Description

  • Develop code as per the team‚Äôs specifications ‚Äì analyze, validate and review code;

  • Participate in coding sprints and continuous improvement;

  • Automation of security rules implementation;

  • Document the tool and operating mode, troubleshooting, etc.;

  • Perform tests.


Qualifications
  • 3+ years of experience with of Django framework;
  • Experience with C++ or C#;
  • Experienced in Agile methodology;
  • Experience using SDLC tools ‚Äì software orchestration / versioning tools, automation server, etc;
  • Good organizational, analytical and problem-solving skills;
  • Autonomous, while capable of working within a team;
  • Fluency in English.


Additional Information

The Devoteam Group works for equal opportunities, promoting its employees based on merit and actively fights against all forms of discrimination. We are convinced that diversity contributes to the creativity, dynamism and excellence of our organization. All of our vacancies are open to people with disabilities.

Title: React Developer
Description:
We are looking for a talented React Developer to join our dynamic team. As a React Developer, you will play a crucial role in designing and implementing high-performance, scalable, and user-friendly web applications, ensuring seamless user experiences and exceptional business outcomes.










Key Responsabilities:







Develop robust, scalable UI components using React and Next.js, with a focus on performance and usability.

Build reusable code and libraries, ensuring maintainability and collaboration with the team.

Ensure technical feasibility of UI/UX designs and optimize for SEO best practices.

Develop and maintain a component library using Storybook to support scalable, consistent design systems.

Collaborate with design teams to deliver seamless integrations and exceptional user experiences.

Review, test, and debug code to maintain high-quality standards.

Implement and optimize GraphQL queries for efficient data handling.

Analyze and optimize website performance, including load time and accessibility.

Collaborate with designers to implement themes and variables from Figma exports for consistent and dynamic styling.

Stay updated on emerging trends in front-end development and propose enhancements to the current stack.










Requirements:










Experience working with React and Next.js.

Proficient in TypeScript.

Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS (including SCSS), and design principles.

Experience with Storybook for UI development and testing.

Proficiency in GraphQL for data fetching and management.

Familiarity with themes and variables usage in Figma for seamless design-to-code workflows.







What We Offer:










An opportunity to work in an international environment

Health insurance

Friendly and cooperative workplace

Worktime flexibility

Continuous training










Apply now and help us shape the future of web development!
